story:
L'ARTBOOK: OLYMPICS – AN EROTIC ARTBOOK TO TRAIN YOUR… SOUL

(English version below)

L'artbook OLYMPICS include 60+ illustrazioni a colori di 35+ artisti internazionali, in formato 16,5x24 cm con rilegatura brossurata.

La cover è realizzata da MARTINA ANDREA BATELLI.

OLYMPICS ci porta nei luoghi della manifestazione sportiva più famosa e riconosciuta del mondo, mostrando in chiave boys' love il lato sensuale ed erotico degli atleti olimpici e paralimpici disegnati dagli artisti che hanno preso parte a questo artbook.

OLYMPICS è il terzo progetto targato Granadilla Lab, preceduto da: Cyrcus (2018), artbook erotico a tema boys’ love finanziato qui su Indiegogo e Cyrcus: Anthology (2019), antologia a fumetti finanziata tramite preorder sul nostro shop online.

 

STRETCH GOAL

 

Abbiamo raggiunto il 34% della campagna e abbiamo quindi deciso fare un regalo a tutti i nostri bakers.

Al raggiungimento dei 2000€ chiunque abbia acquistato una copia cartacea di OLYMPICS riceverà questa bellissima cartolina di LoErre, mentre chi ha acquistato la copia digitale riceverà la stessa illustrazione in formato wallpaper!

Manca davvero pochissimo a raggiungere questo traguardo, grazie al vostro sostegno possiamo fare grandi cose!

 

 

I PERK 

 

TREEDOM + OLIMPIADE 20€ (CARTOOMICS/SPEDIZIONE) – SOLO 10

Per fare un libro si spendono non solo soldi, ma anche alberi.

Con questo perk speciale in collaborazione con TREEDOM invece, comprando il volume cartaceo di Olympics, avrete in regalo un Albero di Cacao. In un periodo storico come questo noi del Granadilla Lab riteniamo che sia importantissimo contribuire alla salvaguardia del pianeta e piantare alberi è uno dei modi in cui possiamo concretamente fare qualcosa.

Il lavoro che i ragazzi di TREEDOM svolgono è straordinario e noi siamo onorati di avere la loro collaborazione per il nostro crowdfunding che ci permette di poter donare a dieci dei nostri sostenitori, questi bellissimi alberi.

ATTENZIONE: se volete che il volume vi venga spedito a casa, dovete selezionare il perk aggiuntivo “Spedizione Italia” in fase di conferma, altrimenti il ritiro sarà a Cartoomics.

 

CERIMONIA DI APERTURA € 9

Artbook versione digitale in formato PDF.

 

EARLY BIRD € 15 (LIMITATO A 15 COPIE) + SPEDIZIONE

Per i sostenitori più veloci: un’offerta limitata a prezzo speciale della copia cartacea dell'artbook. Spedizione standard non tracciata.
 

OLIMPIADE € 20 + SPEDIZIONE

Artbook copia cartacea. Spedizione standard non tracciata.

 

OLIMPIADE - @CARTOOMICS 2020 € 20 [FOR ITALY ONLY]

Artbook copia cartacea. Da ritirare a Cartoomics 2020 presso lo stand Granadilla Lab.

 

FIACCOLA OLIMPICA € 28 + SPEDIZIONE

Artbook copia cartacea + copia digitale formato PDF + adesivi con design di KIKI + spilla di legno con design di SYNESTHESIA (disponibile in due colori diversi, potrai scegliere il tuo preferito al momento dell'acquisto). Spedizione standard non tracciata.

 

TEDOFORI € 30 + SPEDIZIONE

Artbook copia cartacea + copia digitale formato PDF + adesivi con design di KIKI + portachiavi in acrilico con design di MARTINA ANDREA BATELLI. Spedizione standard non tracciata.

 

DOPPIA OLIMPIADE € 40 + SPEDIZIONE

Con questo perk potrete avere due copie cartacee pagando una sola spedizione. Spedizione standard non tracciata.

 

TIRO CON L’ARCO – CUSTOM KITE04 € 65 + SPEDIZIONE RACCOMANDATA GRATUITA

Artbook copia cartacea + copia digitale formato PDF + adesivi con design di KIKI + esclusivo sketch custom A4 in b/n disegnato in tradizionale da KITE04. Spedizione raccomandata GRATUITA.

 

HOCKEY SU PRATO – CUSTOM CRISTINA KOKORO € 65 + SPEDIZIONE RACCOMANDATA

Artbook copia cartacea + copia digitale formato PDF + adesivi con design di KIKI  + esclusivo sketch custom A4 in b/n disegnato in tradizionale da CRISTINA KOKORO. Spedizione raccomandata.

 

BEACHVOLLEY – CUSTOM GIADA FIORANI (POLLINA) € 65 + SPEDIZIONE RACCOMANDATA GRATUITA

Artbook copia cartacea + copia digitale formato PDF + adesivi con design di KIKI + esclusivo sketch custom A4 in b/n disegnato in tradizionale da GIADA FIORANI (POLLINA). Spedizione raccomandata.

 

PALLANUOTO – CUSTOM MAYA’S ART € 65 + SPEDIZIONE RACCOMANDATA GRATUITA

Artbook copia cartacea + copia digitale formato PDF + adesivi con design di KIKI + esclusivo sketch custom A4 in b/n disegnato in tradizionale da MAYA’S ART. Spedizione raccomandata GRATUITA.

 

LOTTA – CUSTOM SALVATORE CALLERAMI € 65 + SPEDIZIONE RACCOMANDATA

Artbook copia cartacea + copia digitale formato PDF + adesivi con design di KIKI+ esclusivo sketch custom A4 in b/n disegnato in tradizionale da SALVATORE CALLERAMI. Spedizione raccomandata.

 

MARATONA GRANADILLA € 70 (LIMITATO A 8 SLOT) + SPEDIZIONE RACCOMANDATA

Il mega perk in edizione limitata con tutte le pubblicazioni di Granadilla Lab.

Include: copia cartacea di OLYMPICS + copia digitale formato PDF di OLYMPICS + copia cartacea di CYRCUS + copia cartacea dello sketchbook di CYRCUS [queste sono le ultime copie di questo volume che non verrà più ristampato] + copia cartacea di ANTHOLOGY + segnalibro CYRCUS + adesivi con design di KIKI. Spedizione raccomandata.

 

SPILLA IN LEGNO € 7 (DA AGGIUNGERE SOLO AD ALTRI PERK CON SPEDIZIONE O RITIRO A CARTOOMICS)

Spilla in legno realizzata da SYNESTHESIA. Disponibile in due colori diversi, potrai scegliere il tuo preferito al momento dell'acquisto.

 

PORTACHIAVI IN ACRILICO € 9 (DA AGGIUNGERE SOLO AD ALTRI PERK CON SPEDIZIONE O RITIRO A CARTOOMICS)

Portachiavi in acrilico realizzato da MARTINA ANDREA BATELLI.

 

CYRCUS: ANTHOLOGY (DA AGGIUNGERE SOLO AD ALTRI PERK CON SPEDIZIONE O RITIRO A CARTOOMICS)

"Cyrcus Anthology" è un'antologia a fumetti le cui storie narrano le vicende di alcuni personaggi apparsi nell'artbook CYRCUS, primo progetto targato Granadilla Lab e finanziato qui su Indiegogo.
21 autori, 15 storie brevi vi condurranno nel backstage più sensuale di tutti i tempi!

Specifiche del volume:
- Dimensioni 165x240 mm
- oltre 130 pagine
- Full Color
- Cover con laminatura in oro

 

GLI ARTISTI DI OLYMPICS

All-Yce, Annafacose, Babawa, Chiaretta E Bon, Cristina Kokoro, Damien Rouge, Dominik, Elisa “Pocci” Pocetta, Erossow, Flavia Biondi, Flavia De Vita, Gee, Georgette, Giada Fiorani (Pollina), Gnappapon, Junopika, Kiki, Kite04, Kunei, Kyel, LoErre, Lucia Stano, Manuela Soriani di Awe, Martina Andrea Batelli, Maya’s Art, Mosca Domestica, NightshadowCat, Noemi De Maio, Patrizia Cocco, RedTaiga, Rum (is for drinking), Ruru, Salvatore Callerami, Selene Neroluna Viola, Simona Nara, Synesthesia, Yoshiioka.

 

COME UTILIZZEREMO I FONDI? 

Tutti gli artisti che hanno partecipato alla realizzazione di OLYMPICS saranno retribuiti per la loro collaborazione, il 40% dei fondi serviranno per coprire queste spese.

Il 25% servirà per la stampa di volumi e gadgets, un altro 25% sarà utilizzato per le spese di spedizione.

L'ultimo 10% servirà per coprire le spese di gestione del crowdfunding.

 

COME POSSO AIUTARVI?

Oltre a partecipare alla campagna di crowdfunding, il modo migliore con cui puoi aiutarci è spargendo la voce: condividi la nostra campagna sui social, falla conoscere ai tuoi amici, il passaparola è il più grande supporto.

Puoi inoltre seguire i nostri social:

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

 

CHI SIAMO

Il Granadilla Lab è un collettivo composto da 4 persone unite da una passione comune: quella per l'arte e i fumetti.

A inizio 2019, dopo una prima campagna di crowdfunding di successo per stampare il primo artbook, CYRCUS, e relativo sketchbook, partecipano come collettivo alla fiera Cartoomics di Milano. A ottobre ha luogo la prevendita del volume a fumetti CYRCUS: ANTHOLOGY. 

  

 

[ENGLISH VERSION]

 

THE ARTBOOK: OLYMPICS – AN EROTIC ARTBOOK TO TRAIN YOUR… SOUL

The  OLYMPICS artbook includes 60+ full colours illustrations made by 35+ international artists; 16,5x24 cm format, perfect binding. The cover is designed by MARTINA ANDREA BATELLI.

OLYMPICS will take you to the places of the most famous and recognized sporting event in the world, showing you the sensual and erotic side of the Olympic and Paralympic athletes in a boys’ love point of view, drawn by the artists who participated in the artbook.

OLYMPICS is the 3rd project by GRANADILLA LAB after Cyrcus (2018), an erotic boys’ love artbook funded on Indiegogo, and Cyrcus: Anthology (2019), a comics anthology funded on presale on our online shop.

 

THE PERKS 

 

TREEDOM + OLYMPICS 20 € (CARTOOMICS / SHIPPING) - LIMITED TO 10 COPIES

When you make a book you spend not only money, but also trees.

With this special perk in collaboration with TREEDOM, you have the chance to buy the paper copy of Olympics and having a Cocoa Tree as a gift. In this exact moment in time, we at the Granadilla Lab believe that it is very important to plant more trees.

The guys from TREEDOM do an extraordinary work in planting new trees, and we are honoured to have their collaboration for our crowdfunding! So we are extremely happy to be able to donate these beautiful trees to ten of our bakers.

ATTENTION: the pick up at Cartoomics is for Italy only, to have the volume sent to your address you must select the additional "Shipping Worldwide" perk at checkout.

 

CERIMONIA D'APERTURA € 9

Digital version of the artbook in PDF format.

 

EARLY BIRD € 15 (LIMITED TO 15 COPIES) + SHIPPING

For our first and fastest backers: a limited offer at a special price of the paper copy of the artbook. Standard shipment.

 

OLIMPIADE € 20 + SHIPPING

Paper copy of the artbook. Standard shipment.

 

FIACCOLA OLIMPICA € 28 + SHIPPING

Paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + stickers made by KIKI + a wooden pin made by SYNESTHESIA (available in two different colours; you can choose your favourite colour when doing the purchase). Standard shipment.

 

TEDOFORI € 30 + SHIPPING

Paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + stickers made by KIKI + an acrylic keychain made by MARTINA ANDREA BATELLI. Standard shipment.

 

DOPPIA OLIMPIADE € 40 + SHIPPING

You can have 2 copies of the paper copy of the artbook by paying just one shipment. Standard shipment.

 

TIRO CON L'ARCO – CUSTOMIZED BY KITE04 € 65 + TRACKED SHIPMENT

Paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + stickers made by KIKI + a personalised A4 b/w drawing created by KITE04. Tracked shipment.

 

HOCKEY SU PRATO – CUSTOMIZED BY CRISTINA KOKORO € 65 + TRACKED SHIPMENT

Paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + stickers made by KIKI + a personalised A4 b/w drawing created by CRISTINA KOKORO. Tracked shipment.

 

BEACHVOLLEY – CUSTOMIZED BY GIADA FIORANI (POLLINA) € 65 + TRACKED SHIPMENT

Paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + stickers made by KIKI + a personalised A4 b/w drawing created by GIADA FIORANI (POLLINA). Tracked shipment.

 

PALLANUOTO – CUSTOMIZED BY MAYA’S ART € 65 + TRACKED SHIPMENT

Paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + stickers made by KIKI + a personalised A4 b/w drawing created by MAYA’S ART. Tracked shipment.

 

LOTTA – CUSTOMIZED BY SALVATORE CALLERAMI € 65 + TRACKED SHIPMENT

Paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + stickers made by KIKI + a personalised A4 b/w drawing created by SALVATORE CALLERAMI. Tracked shipment.

 

MARATONA GRANADILLA € 70 (LIMITED TO 8 BUNDLES) + PRIORITY INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENT

The mega perk in limited edition with all the volumes published by Granadilla Lab.

Included: paper copy of OLYMPICS + its digital copy in PDF format + paper copy of CYRCUS + paper copy of CYRCUS’ sketchbook [these are the last remaining copies of this volume, then it won't be reprinted] + paper copy of CYRCUS: ANTHOLOGY [only in Italian] + CYRCUS bookmark + stickers made by KIKI. Priority International shipment.

 

SPILLA IN LEGNO (WOODEN PIN) € 7 [THIS PERK IS VALID ONLY IF COMBINED WITH ANOTHER PERKWITH SHIPMENT OPTION]

Wooden pin made by SYNESTHESIA. Available in two different colours; you can choose your favourite colour when doing the purchase.

 

PORTACHIAVI IN ACRILICO (ACRYLIC KEYCHAIN) € 9 [THIS PERK IS VALID ONLY IF COMBINED WITH ANOTHER PERK WITH SHIPMENT OPTION]

Acrylic keychain made by MARTINA ANDREA BATELLI.


CYRCUS: ANTHOLOGY [THIS PERK IS VALID ONLY IF COMBINED WITH ANOTHER PERK WITH SHIPMENT OPTION]

"Cyrcus Anthology" is a comics collection that tells the stories of some of the characters that appeared in the CYRCUS artbook, the first project by Granadilla Lab funded here on Indiegogo.
21 artists, 15 short stories that bring you in the hottest backstage in the world!

Volume info:
- Size 165x240 mm
- 130+ pages
- Full Color
- Cover with golden foil

 

OLYMPICS ARTISTS

All-Yce, Annafacose, Babawa, Chiaretta E Bon, Cristina Kokoro, Damien Rouge, Dominik, Elisa “Pocci” Pocetta, Erossow, Flavia Biondi, Flavia De Vita, Gee, Georgette, Giada Fiorani (Pollina), Gnappapon, Junopika, Kiki, Kite04, Kunei, Kyel, LoErre, Lucia Stano, Manuela Soriani di Awe, Martina Andrea Batelli, Maya’s Art, Mosca Domestica, NightshadowCat, Noemi De Maio, Patrizia Cocco, RedTaiga, Rum (is for drinking), Ruru, Salvatore Callerami, Selene Neroluna Viola, Simona Nara, Synesthesia, Yoshiioka.

 

HOW WILL WE USE THE FUNDS?

All the artists who participated in creating OLYMPICS will be paid for their collaboration, so 40% of the funds will be used to cover these expenses.

25% will be used to print books and gadgets, another 25% will go for shipments.

Finally a 10% will be used to cover the crowdfunding fees.

 

HOW CAN I  HELP YOU?

In addition to contributing to the crowdfunding campaign, the best way you can help us is spreading the word: share our campaign on social media, make it known to your friends, spreading the word is the biggest support.

You can also follow our social networks:

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

 

WHO WE ARE

The Granadilla Lab is a group of 4 people united by a common passion for art and comics.

At the beginning of 2019, after our first and successful crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo for the printing of our first artbook CYRCUS and its sketchbook, we participated at the convention Cartoomics in Milano. In October we organized the pre-sale of our second work, the comics volume CYRCUS: Anthology.

story:
The Numbers

The first offering of Earthbound gained 450 backers, which funded a 2000 copy print run, 500 or which are hardcover.

The books are are ordered!  Cut the check last weak.  Digital Tier is fulfilled.  Lots of positive buzz from reviews.  Meanwhile I'm opening the campaign for a second offering featuring a limited portion of the remaining copies.

 

The Story

In the Universe of Earthbound there are 13 Sponsors across the galaxy.  They recruit the greatest contenders on each planet and submit two every four years to the GGPT, Galactic Grande Prix Tournament. They hold a draft every year for an exclusivity contract, so other Sponsors won't compete for the same contenders.  But once you draft a contender, you still have to go out and recruit them.  A subclass of warriors emerged to make a living specifically on the task of recruitment, known as headhunters.  Even headhunters are often compelled to do their job by blackmail and threats of punishment.  Freedom is not guaranteed, even Free Will is not guaranteed. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HGnuNkLPDc0 

 

Narwhal Books

Hey! My name is Narwhal.  I'm heavily influenced by European comics, and manga.  I've spent the past 15 years working on my storytelling craft.  I'm obsessed with structure and efficiency, as well as abstract angles like scale and focus of the story, what to show, how to disseminate information to the reader, and how to layer points of view to thicken the subtext.  I believe the art should compliment the story, and my goal is in service of pacing: extending the reader's retention for a single sitting.  My goal is to suck the reader in.  That will always be the goal.  

I have lots of backed up material and will be unveiling it soon.  Earthbound is starting it all off.  Get in on the ground level!

Thanks for reading!

The books are are ordered!  Cut the check last weak.  Digital Tier is fulfilled.  Lots of positive buzz from reviews.  Meanwhile I'm opening the campaign for a second offering featuring a limited portion of the remaining copies.
 

The Story
In the Universe of Earthbound there are 13 Sponsors across the galaxy.  They recruit the greatest contenders on each planet and submit two every four years to the GGPT, Galactic Grande Prix Tournament. They hold a draft every year for an exclusivity contract, so other Sponsors won't compete for the same contenders.  But once you draft a contender, you still have to go out and recruit them.  A subclass of warriors emerged to make a living specifically on the task of recruitment, known as headhunters.  Even headhunters are often compelled to do their job by blackmail and threats of punishment.  Freedom is not guaranteed, even Free Will is not guaranteed. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HGnuNkLPDc0 
 

Narwhal Books
Hey! My name is Narwhal.  I'm heavily influenced by European comics, and manga.  I've spent the past 15 years working on my storytelling craft.  I'm obsessed with structure and efficiency, as well as abstract angles like scale and focus of the story, what to show, how to disseminate information to the reader, and how to layer points of view to thicken the subtext.  I believe the art should compliment the story, and my goal is in service of pacing: extending the reader's retention for a single sitting.  My goal is to suck the reader in.  That will always be the goal.  
I have lots of backed up material and will be unveiling it soon.  Earthbound is starting it all off.  Get in on the ground level!
Thanks for reading!

story:
(中文翻譯請往下滑，謝謝  -  For Chinese Translation, please scroll down. Thank you)​

"out of the abundance of the heart, my art flows.”

To tell the story of Gi-gi, I must start from the year I took an interest in watercolors. Though I grew up in a very artistic family, I’ve never had any formal art trainings. So, every time I want to try something new, it still feels like a big challenge to me. I had no equipment or material, nor any money at that time to buy them. But I had a good determination, so I found an old box of watercolor pencil. “Ah-ha,” I thought, “this will work!” I took the pencil, shave them into dust, mixed them with water and created my own watercolor paste. 

I have a postcard featuring a painting of a family of foxes taped in front of my desk. It was something that I bought a few years ago, and something about that painting really touched my heart. But sometimes when I looked at it, it made me a little sad. I knew I loved the painting, but I also knew I don’t have the skill to paint something as beautiful. So I looked up a bunch of fox drawings on Google and Pinterest. I tried to copy and alternate the technique and styles. Then I practiced, but nothing came out too satisfying. My art just didn’t look as good as the others… Finally, I gave up on trying.

Giving up turns out to be one of the best things! Because that’s the moment when I decided to come up with something of my own. Something that represented me, and that is not confined by limitations. A huge head, small body, short limbs, and an oversized tail. Someone who didn’t look at the world the right-side up, and someone who won’t forget to smile. That was how the first painting of Gi-gi was born. 

I am starting this campaign for two reasons. 

  1. I’ve always wanted to make my drawing into prints. This is my first attempt. It’s scary to me, but with your help I believe I can do it. This time I am only printing calendars and postcards. But one day I hope to have many products like wall arts, notebooks, children’s books…etc. By making my art into prints, you’ll help them reach a wider audience. My hope is that my work will not only brighten people’s days, but also be an encouragement to them.
  2. I am going on my journey to study at Bethel Supernatural School of Ministry (BSSM) this August. I truly believe my time at BSSM will help me to become a stronger person and to live in greater freedom. I also hope that as I grow in Christ, my arts will also grow, and that I’ll be able to share even more stories with you. To read more about my journey to BSSM, please CLICK HERE. As a Taiwanese-Belizean I will not be able to work while on my student visa. Which means I’ll need to have all my school funding, including living expense available before I leave.

The money I raise will help me in so many ways. From printing and packaging, visa application, tuition and living expenses, to distribution of products at local stores in Taiwan and in Belize. But what meant the most to me is not just the money. By supporting this campaign you’ve encouraged me as an artist, and for that, I truly, deeply appreciate it. I also hope my art and my story has been an inspiration to you, and a blessing.

 

This project took me a while to complete. I knew I wanted to share Gi-gi with you, but throwing a bunch of cute drawing of Gi-gi together just won’t do. Gi-gi was created to be free and to inspire, so I knew it has to be something from my heart. 

I’ve put together 12 different theme/memo. These are words that I love, yet in this overwhelming life, we seem to easily forget. So, what better place to put these on, than a calendar that we’ll get to look at every day. 

The calendar includes Gi-gi, her best friend Abby, the raccoon, and Savanna, the mouse. I’ve also added the grey fox, the green iguana, the sea turtle, and Belize national bird, the keel-billed toucan, featuring a few of the lovely animals of Belize, where I grew up.

 

  • PDF 2020 Calendar - a download-able PDF calendar of 2020. Featuring 14 (12 month, + cover, + bonus page). The size is set as A4, so you can print them out or export them as single JPG for your laptop backgrounds. There will be no holidays marked on the calendar, so it can be used for any country or any culture.​

 

  • Tabletop Calendar - a Card Style, blank tabletop calendar measuring 13.7cm x 20.8cm. Packaged flat and the base can be folded into stand. Holding eight pieces of cards (printed front and back).  Blank Calendar is a flexible calendar with no dates or year, only Month and Weekdays. So, you can start using it anytime you want. Each month will have its drawing, and all you need to do is to pick up your phone or an existing calendar, and spend less than 5mins to fill in the dates.

 

  • Postcards - Six of the calendar painting, plus “The story of Gi-gi” painting (7 in total), will be made into postcards. So, you can share them with the people you love, frame them, or like me, tape them on your wall. Standard Size 10.5cm x 14.8cm. Seven in a set.

 

  • “The story of Gi-gi” painting - (Limited to 50 pieces) The original “The story of Gi-gi” watercolor painting repainted. Done on white watercolor paper, approx. 27.5cm x 19cm. Re-painted, numbered and signed by Amymeowu.

 

  • Watercolor Originals (Calendar collection) - (Limited to 12 pieces) One of the 12 original Calendar’s watercolor paintings. All 12 are different, so the one you pick will goes by a first come first served basis. Painted on warm (cream) watercolor paper. Approx. 27cm x 19.6cm. Signed by Amymeowu.

 

 

All printing will be done in Taiwan. I am aiming to print 500 copies or more on each one of the designs to bring down the printing cost. The original paintings are all done in Belize, where I am located. But I’ll be mailing the originals to Taiwan ahead of time. So both originals and prints can be packaged and mailed out directly from Taiwan.

Printing and Packaging will start immediately when the campaign ends. It should take no more than 20 working days to be ready for shipping. Shipment depends on what part of the world you’re located .

Since this campaign is made for both supporting the artwork and for supporting the artist’s schooling. The price is set for its purpose. In the future, extra printing will still be distributed to different shops for you to purchase. However, price will differ depending on the shop and its country.

 

This is my first crowdfunding project, I have carefully prepared everything to the littlest details before I launch this campaign. The paintings are done. The printing company is settled, and test prints has been made. So everything should go smoothly. But because this is my first crowdfunding project, I might have overlooked some details. If that happens and printing and shipping is delayed, please bear with me, and I’ll do my best to have it resolved as soon as possible. 

As for the part of your support that goes towards my schooling at BSSM, there is a risk of being rejected of my student visa. If unfortunately that happens, I will make good use of the money on creating more artworks, enroll in classes like digital painting, or purchasing materials. All funding will go towards my studio and not my personal use.

 

Once again thank you so much for your time and your support. I truly hope my story and art has inspired you and has brighten your day. 

Please help me to spread the word and SHARE this campaign with the world. 

If you feel lead to support me directly for BSSM. You can either help me toward my tuition by clicking HERE, or message me for further information. 

Don’t forget to find me on Facebook or Instagram @amymeowu for updates and more stories. Sincerely, Amy Wu

Special thanks to my family and friends who has supported me and helped me in this process. To my dear mom and dad, Arthur Wu (my brother), Jessica Lu (my cousin), Evelyne Wang, Rebecca Stirm, Viola Wu, Ada Wang, Sydney Peng and Jaclyn Peng. And all who have encouraged me and cheered me on along the way. I know I cannot have done it without you. Thank you so So much!!! Love Amy.

 

(以下是中文翻譯的內容。 - Chinese Translation starts here.)

 

“橘橘”和她森林中的好朋友 

 

「我的藝術創作，源自於一顆豐沛的心。」

說到橘橘的故事，就必須從我開始對水彩感興趣那年說起。雖然我成長於一個藝術家庭，卻從來沒受過正式藝術訓練。所以每當我想嘗試新事物的時候，總覺得充滿挑戰。我沒有工具，也沒有材料，更沒有足夠買這些用品的經費，但是我意志堅定，找到一盒舊水彩色鉛筆，心想：「哈哈！這個可以用！」於是我拿起色鉛筆，削成粉末，與水混合，然後創造出自己的水彩顏料。

我的書桌前貼著一張明信片，上面畫著狐狸一家人。這張明信片是我在幾年前買的，上面的圖畫深深感動著我。不過，當我看著這幅畫時，偶爾會覺得難過。我知道自己喜歡畫畫，但也知道自己沒有足夠的繪畫技巧能畫出這麼美麗的畫面。所以我在 Google 和 Pinterest 找到許多狐狸的圖畫，試著模仿與改變繪畫技巧和風格，然後不停練習，但是成果都不太理想。我的作品就是比不過其他人的作品… 最後我放棄了。

沒想到，放棄模仿變成了最棒的一件事！因為那一刻，我決定用自己的風格，創造出代表自己的作品，一個不受各種框架侷限的作品：大大的頭、小小的身體、短短的四肢，還有一個超大的尾巴，這個狐狸會顛倒著看世界，而且絕不會忘記微笑，這就是橘橘誕生的過程。

 

開始這個集資計畫有兩個原因：

  1. 把作品印出來的想法一直在我心中，而這是我第一次付諸實行。對我而言這很恐怖，但有你的協助，我相信我做得到。這次我只會印製年曆和明信片，但希望未來可以印製更多的產品，例如牆面裝置藝術、筆記本、童書等。你的支持，將讓我的藝術作品接觸到更多的人。我希望我的作品不只能讓大家開心，也能鼓勵大家。
  2. 今年八月，我即將前往伯特利超自然學校（Bethel Supernatural School of Ministry，BSSM）學習。我深信在 BSSM 的時光，將幫助我變得更堅強、更自由。我也盼望，當我在基督裡越發成熟的同時，我的藝術創作也能一起成長，而我就能和你分享更多的故事。如果想知道我為什麼決定到 BSSM 讀書以及中間的過程，請點此連結(英文版)。身為一個台裔貝里斯人，我拿的是學生簽證，在美國求學期間無法工作，因此我需要在離開貝里斯前募足所有求學資金，其中也包括生活費。

這項計畫所募集的資金，將在各方面帶給我幫助，包括圖畫的印刷及包裝、簽證申請、學費和生活開銷，以及在台灣及貝里斯配送產品。但對我而言，最有意義的並不只是錢，而是你透過支持這個計畫，鼓勵了身為藝術家的我。為此，我心中充滿感謝。希望我的創作和故事也激勵了你，成為你的祝福。

 

我花了一些時間才完成這項計畫。我一直想和大家分享橘橘，但光是讓大家看許多可愛的圖畫是不夠的。我創作的橘橘是自由的，是能鼓勵人的，所以必須源自於我的心。

我挑選了12個主題/備忘錄，這些是我很喜歡的話語。然而，在忙碌的生活中，我們很容易遺忘。所以，我決定把他們放在年曆上，這樣就可以天天看到。

年曆中的角色包括橘橘，她最好的朋友浣熊艾比以及小老鼠莎凡娜。我也創造了灰狐狸、綠蜥蜴、海龜、以及貝里斯國鳥彩虹巨嘴鳥，這些都是生活在我成長的國家貝里斯的可愛動物。

 

附註：所有的印刷品及PDF下載檔內容一律為英文。

  • 2020年曆（PDF版） - 2020 PDF版年曆供下載，裡面有14張圖畫（12個月+封面+其它），大小為A4，可列印或輸出成 jpg 電腦螢幕背景。年曆將不會標示假日，所以不管任何國家、文化都適用。

 

  • 桌曆 – 13.7cm x 20.8cm 卡片式空白桌曆。平面包裝，紙底座可摺成底座，每套有8張卡片(正反面印刷)。空白桌曆沒有註記日期年份，只標示月份和星期，所以可以在任何時間開始使用。每個月份都有專屬的一張圖，使用者只需拿出手機或現有的年曆，不花五分鐘就可以填好日期。

 

  • 明信片 – 六張年曆圖片，以及我所畫的第一張橘橘圖片將被製成明信片（總共七幅畫），讓你可以和所愛的人分享、表框，或是和我一樣，將他們貼在牆上。標準大小為10.5cm x 14.8cm，一組7張。

 

  • 《橘橘的故事》 畫作 – （限量50張）一張《橘橘的故事》 水彩畫，紙張為白色水彩紙，大小約27.5cm x 19cm。重新繪製並標註限量序號，上有創作者 Amymeowu親筆簽名。

 

  • 桌曆水彩原稿 -（限量12張）- 桌曆圖片的水彩原稿一張，每張都不同，先買先選。紙張為乳白色水彩紙，大小約 27cm x 19.6cm，上有創作者 Amymeowu親筆簽名。

 

附註：所有的印刷品及PDF下載檔內容一律為英文。

 

因為Indiegogo是個英文網頁，在此特別為講中文的朋友們重點翻譯購買的方式，希望能讓你們在使用上可以方便一點，若想瞭解網頁其他細節的內容，建議請會講英文的朋友協助你一起購買哦：

購買步驟：在右邊的小圖中選擇你喜歡的 “支持方式” （Select a Perk）滑鼠點選圖案後會展開詳細的資訊，確認購買內容後（若不確定購買內容，可以看上面“支持方式”的中文圖翻譯。那區的圖案是跟右邊的選項對稱的），請點選下面的  “選這個支持方式” （GET THIS PERK），網頁會帶你前往付款及填寫地址的頁面。

付款及填寫地址的頁面:

 

印刷將在台灣完成，我計畫每個設計都至少印500份，好降低印刷成本。所有的原稿都在貝里斯完成，也就是我現在居住的地方。但我會提早將原稿寄至台灣，所以原稿和印刷品都會直接從台灣包裝寄出。

集資活動一結束，就會開始印刷及包裝，最多不會超過20個工作天就可以出貨。運送時間將取決於你所選擇的收件地點。

由於這項集資活動的目的是要支持我的創作及求學所需，所以費用也照此定價。未來，這些作品也會在其他店鋪販售，但價格將依店家及國家有所不同。

 

這是我的第一個集資計畫，在公布這項計畫前，我已做好萬全的準備。畫作已經完成，我已和印刷公司談妥細節，試印樣品也已完成，所以一切應該都會順利進行。但因為這是我第一次集資，所以還是可能會有被我忽略的地方。若是因為這樣而造成印刷或送貨延遲，請多多包涵，我會盡全力在最快的時間內解決問題。

學生簽證的申請還是有被拒絕的可能，若不幸發生，我將會妥善使用原本將用於支持我在伯特利學院求學的經費，創作更多作品，參加數位繪畫課程，或用於材料選購。所有的資金都會用於我的工作室，不會用在個人開銷。

 

再次感謝你們的支持及時間。希望我的創作和故事也激勵了你，成為你的祝福。

也請你幫我把集資計畫的消息傳出去，分享給大家。

如果你有感動想要直接幫助我的BSSM求學資金，你可以點此連結到學費奉獻網，或是直接與我聯絡。

請別忘了在臉書或IG追蹤我（@amymeowu）。謝謝大家。

Amy Wu 敬上

特別要謝謝家人與朋友的幫忙和鼓勵，感謝爸爸媽媽，哥哥(Arthur Wu)，表姊 (Jessica Lu)，Evelyne Wang, Rebecca Stirm, Viola Wu, Ada Wang, Sydney Peng , Jaclyn Peng, 和一路上為我加油的人。 因為有你們，我才能走到這一步。真心的謝謝大家～

If that happens and printing and shipping is delayed, please bear with me, and I’ll do my best to have it resolved as soon as possible. 
As for the part of your support that goes towards my schooling at BSSM, there is a risk of being rejected of my student visa. If unfortunately that happens, I will make good use of the money on creating more artworks, enroll in classes like digital painting, or purchasing materials. All funding will go towards my studio and not my personal use.
 

Once again thank you so much for your time and your support. I truly hope my story and art has inspired you and has brighten your day. 
Please help me to spread the word and SHARE this campaign with the world. 
If you feel lead to support me directly for BSSM. You can either help me toward my tuition by clicking HERE, or message me for further information. 
Don’t forget to find me on Facebook or Instagram @amymeowu for updates and more stories. Sincerely, Amy Wu

Special thanks to my family and friends who has supported me and helped me in this process. To my dear mom and dad, Arthur Wu (my brother), Jessica Lu (my cousin), Evelyne Wang, Rebecca Stirm, Viola Wu, Ada Wang, Sydney Peng and Jaclyn Peng. And all who have encouraged me and cheered me on along the way. I know I cannot have done it without you. Thank you so So much!!! Love Amy.
 
(以下是中文翻譯的內容。 - Chinese Translation starts here.)
 
“橘橘”和她森林中的好朋友 

 

「我的藝術創作，源自於一顆豐沛的心。」
說到橘橘的故事，就必須從我開始對水彩感興趣那年說起。雖然我成長於一個藝術家庭，卻從來沒受過正式藝術訓練。所以每當我想嘗試新事物的時候，總覺得充滿挑戰。我沒有工具，也沒有材料，更沒有足夠買這些用品的經費，但是我意志堅定，找到一盒舊水彩色鉛筆，心想：「哈哈！這個可以用！」於是我拿起色鉛筆，削成粉末，與水混合，然後創造出自己的水彩顏料。
我的書桌前貼著一張明信片，上面畫著狐狸一家人。這張明信片是我在幾年前買的，上面的圖畫深深感動著我。不過，當我看著這幅畫時，偶爾會覺得難過。我知道自己喜歡畫畫，但也知道自己沒有足夠的繪畫技巧能畫出這麼美麗的畫面。所以我在 Google 和 Pinterest 找到許多狐狸的圖畫，試著模仿與改變繪畫技巧和風格，然後不停練習，但是成果都不太理想。我的作品就是比不過其他人的作品… 最後我放棄了。
沒想到，放棄模仿變成了最棒的一件事！因為那一刻，我決定用自己的風格，創造出代表自己的作品，一個不受各種框架侷限的作品：大大的頭、小小的身體、短短的四肢，還有一個超大的尾巴，這個狐狸會顛倒著看世界，而且絕不會忘記微笑，這就是橘橘誕生的過程。
 

開始這個集資計畫有兩個原因：

把作品印出來的想法一直在我心中，而這是我第一次付諸實行。對我而言這很恐怖，但有你的協助，我相信我做得到。這次我只會印製年曆和明信片，但希望未來可以印製更多的產品，例如牆面裝置藝術、筆記本、童書等。你的支持，將讓我的藝術作品接觸到更多的人。我希望我的作品不只能讓大家開心，也能鼓勵大家。
今年八月，我即將前往伯特利超自然學校（Bethel Supernatural School of Ministry，BSSM）學習。我深信在 BSSM 的時光，將幫助我變得更堅強、更自由。我也盼望，當我在基督裡越發成熟的同時，我的藝術創作也能一起成長，而我就能和你分享更多的故事。如果想知道我為什麼決定到 BSSM 讀書以及中間的過程，請點此連結(英文版)。身為一個台裔貝里斯人，我拿的是學生簽證，在美國求學期間無法工作，因此我需要在離開貝里斯前募足所有求學資金，其中也包括生活費。


這項計畫所募集的資金，將在各方面帶給我幫助，包括圖畫的印刷及包裝、簽證申請、學費和生活開銷，以及在台灣及貝里斯配送產品。但對我而言，最有意義的並不只是錢，而是你透過支持這個計畫，鼓勵了身為藝術家的我。為此，我心中充滿感謝。希望我的創作和故事也激勵了你，成為你的祝福。
 

我花了一些時間才完成這項計畫。我一直想和大家分享橘橘，但光是讓大家看許多可愛的圖畫是不夠的。我創作的橘橘是自由的，是能鼓勵人的，所以必須源自於我的心。
我挑選了12個主題/備忘錄，這些是我很喜歡的話語。然而，在忙碌的生活中，我們很容易遺忘。所以，我決定把他們放在年曆上，這樣就可以天天看到。
年曆中的角色包括橘橘，她最好的朋友浣熊艾比以及小老鼠莎凡娜。我也創造了灰狐狸、綠蜥蜴、海龜、以及貝里斯國鳥彩虹巨嘴鳥，這些都是生活在我成長的國家貝里斯的可愛動物。
 

附註：所有的印刷品及PDF下載檔內容一律為英文。

2020年曆（PDF版） - 2020 PDF版年曆供下載，裡面有14張圖畫（12個月+封面+其它），大小為A4，可列印或輸出成 jpg 電腦螢幕背景。年曆將不會標示假日，所以不管任何國家、文化都適用。

 

桌曆 – 13.7cm x 20.8cm 卡片式空白桌曆。平面包裝，紙底座可摺成底座，每套有8張卡片(正反面印刷)。空白桌曆沒有註記日期年份，只標示月份和星期，所以可以在任何時間開始使用。每個月份都有專屬的一張圖，使用者只需拿出手機或現有的年曆，不花五分鐘就可以填好日期。

 

明信片 – 六張年曆圖片，以及我所畫的第一張橘橘圖片將被製成明信片（總共七幅畫），讓你可以和所愛的人分享、表框，或是和我一樣，將他們貼在牆上。標準大小為10.5cm x 14.8cm，一組7張。

 

《橘橘的故事》 畫作 – （限量50張）一張《橘橘的故事》 水彩畫，紙張為白色水彩紙，大小約27.5cm x 19cm。重新繪製並標註限量序號，上有創作者 Amymeowu親筆簽名。

 

桌曆水彩原稿 -（限量12張）- 桌曆圖片的水彩原稿一張，每張都不同，先買先選。紙張為乳白色水彩紙，大小約 27cm x 19.6cm，上有創作者 Amymeowu親筆簽名。

 

附註：所有的印刷品及PDF下載檔內容一律為英文。


 

因為Indiegogo是個英文網頁，在此特別為講中文的朋友們重點翻譯購買的方式，希望能讓你們在使用上可以方便一點，若想瞭解網頁其他細節的內容，建議請會講英文的朋友協助你一起購買哦：
購買步驟：在右邊的小圖中選擇你喜歡的 “支持方式” （Select a Perk）滑鼠點選圖案後會展開詳細的資訊，確認購買內容後（若不確定購買內容，可以看上面“支持方式”的中文圖翻譯。那區的圖案是跟右邊的選項對稱的），請點選下面的  “選這個支持方式” （GET THIS PERK），網頁會帶你前往付款及填寫地址的頁面。

付款及填寫地址的頁面:


 

印刷將在台灣完成，我計畫每個設計都至少印500份，好降低印刷成本。所有的原稿都在貝里斯完成，也就是我現在居住的地方。但我會提早將原稿寄至台灣，所以原稿和印刷品都會直接從台灣包裝寄出。
集資活動一結束，就會開始印刷及包裝，最多不會超過20個工作天就可以出貨。運送時間將取決於你所選擇的收件地點。
由於這項集資活動的目的是要支持我的創作及求學所需，所以費用也照此定價。未來，這些作品也會在其他店鋪販售，但價格將依店家及國家有所不同。

 

這是我的第一個集資計畫，在公布這項計畫前，我已做好萬全的準備。畫作已經完成，我已和印刷公司談妥細節，試印樣品也已完成，所以一切應該都會順利進行。但因為這是我第一次集資，所以還是可能會有被我忽略的地方。若是因為這樣而造成印刷或送貨延遲，請多多包涵，我會盡全力在最快的時間內解決問題。
學生簽證的申請還是有被拒絕的可能，若不幸發生，我將會妥善使用原本將用於支持我在伯特利學院求學的經費，創作更多作品，參加數位繪畫課程，或用於材料選購。所有的資金都會用於我的工作室，不會用在個人開銷。
 

再次感謝你們的支持及時間。希望我的創作和故事也激勵了你，成為你的祝福。
也請你幫我把集資計畫的消息傳出去，分享給大家。
如果你有感動想要直接幫助我的BSSM求學資金，你可以點此連結到學費奉獻網，或是直接與我聯絡。
請別忘了在臉書或IG追蹤我（@amymeowu）。謝謝大家。
Amy Wu 敬上

特別要謝謝家人與朋友的幫忙和鼓勵，感謝爸爸媽媽，哥哥(Arthur Wu)，表姊 (Jessica Lu)，Evelyne Wang, Rebecca Stirm, Viola Wu, Ada Wang, Sydney Peng , Jaclyn Peng, 和一路上為我加油的人。 因為有你們，我才能走到這一步。真心的謝謝大家～

story:
For those who don't know, Deviant Life is an online comic hosted on my Discerning Deviant blog about people like my friends and me, kinky polyamorous and LGBT+.  It centers around a sex worker named Audrey and her polycule. I release strips sporadically because the comic is a self-indulgent hobby, not something that pays any of my bills. The few and wonderful patrons I do have basically cover my expenses creating and hosting the comic and occasionally affords me an extra drink at the end of the month.

One of the most common requests I get is people wanting to buy a physical copy of the strips, and as it so happens publishing a physical comic book is on my bucket list. So here we are. 

Deviant Life, Volume 1 is going to be a 24 page floppy  containing the first 48 Deviant Life strips along with an assortment of bonus material, such as the Patreon supporter exclusive art. 

In all honesty, I already have personal money put aside for the print run so it will happen for my own vanity even if not a single person pre-orders. This is just the easiest way I know to tailor the size of the print run to demand so that I don't waste a lot of money printing copies nobody but the artist and me wants. 

So, no pressure. 

P.S. - Those of you who have been Patreon supporters longer than 10 months will be receiving a copy gratis because I appreciate the hell out of you, so don't pre-order unless you just want extra copies or to get in on the other perks. I'll contact you asking for a shipping address after the books are printed.

story:
Welcome to Miskatonic High, the comic series about the monsters who reside in a small New England town and the students who ride the bus with them. Inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft, and skewered with our uniquely silly/sarcastic sense of humor, this is a series unlike anything you've read. But don't worry, you don't need to have read the works of H.P. Lovecraft (or attended a small New England high school) to enjoy this series. If you've ever dealt with any kind of monster (tentacled or not), this series is for you!

The story so far

We successfully crowdfunded the first six issues, finishing our first season, and sold more than 5,000 comic books throughout the last year! And for some reason, our backers keep coming back for more (clearly high school left them as deranged as us)!

Um... spoilers. In issues 1-6, we learned that in the rustic hills of a small New England Berkshire town lies the prestigious Miskatonic High School. When the Community Service Club went on a field trip, they were launched on a strange journey that birthed a terrible evil into our century (even worse than the toilet paper frenzy of last week)!

Bonus story

We've created an 8-page short story specifically for this collection! The story features two of our characters touring the town of Miskatonic at night with hints and suggestions about things to come. 

Reviews are in

The reviews for the whole series have been tremendous!

Jenn Marshall of Sirens of Sequentials:

“Miskatonic High is a fun story that balances everything you want in  a good horror story. There is some gore, but not so much that you get  overwhelmed. The jokes are funny, but they don’t make the story feel  like a parody of something else. It was well thought out, and I cannot  wait to see where it is going to go next.”

“The monsters are very Lovecraftian. … Because they have that Lovecraftian feel to them, the monsters really are both written and drawn in a way that affected my Lizard Brain.” Read the full review

The Pullbox called it “the bastard lovechild of John Hughes & H.P. Lovecraft.” 

Here’s a bit from Paul’s review: “It brings a mismatched group of high schoolers together, throwing them against evil the likes of which you’d find in a dusty tome full of impossible to pronounce names. The beauty is in the execution. Despite some pretty heavy themes -- mounting madness, eternal torment, human sacrifice -- Mike Shea’s story stays fairly tongue in cheek. [Artist Ryan Mendoza] knows how to get his   Lovecraft on.” Read the full review

Michael Logarta of Goshdarn Geeky said:

"What better way to end the first season of Miskatonic High than with a bang—and by 'bang,' we mean a spectacular issue jam-packed with eldritch sorcery, tentacular delights, electric dance moves, voyages through space and time, daddy issues, mommy issues, friendship  issues, at least one perverted ghost, and more Lovecraftian weirdness than you can shake a questionably named cat at.

"Overall, Miskatonic High #6: Monster’s Ball is a pleasure from start to finish, and a spectacular way to end the series’ first season." Read the full review

Stretch goals

Items and variants

The personalized metal bookmark measures 1.5" by 4" and features the Miskatonic High logo's tentacle to help you save your place in your favorite ancient tome. Each will be personalized with your name (we'll need you to respond to the survey within three days to get production going on these).

We've got a few versions of our book: the 176-page softcover trade paperback (TPB) features all six issues, a new cover by Miskatonic High artist Ryan Mendoza, plus the 8-page bonus story! 

The 248-page hardcover features all six issues, a special Breakfast Club in Hell inspired cover, the bonus story, a variant cover gallery, the popular Teachers Lounge behind-the-scenes sections, a selection of Lovecraft stories and much more! The hardcover will also be offered in a limited bookplate version, signed and numbered by both writer Mike Shea and artist Ryan Mendoza.

The vVurMzflessshhh Premium Edition features VENIEN's fully re-worked pulp version of the series in a disturbingly covered and oversized hardcover. This variant features the Gidim image on the cover and has an aged-black and white pulp appearance throughout. This edition is limited to 25 numbered copies and will never be reissued. It is also available in an exclusive Portfolio edition that includes the hardcover and a hardback folio case full of prints of VENIEN’s cover art and other extras. Limited to 25 ever and will never ever be reissued. 

Perks

We have more perks than you could shake your tentacle at (please don't though... that's the kind of thing that'll get you arrested):

 

Add ons

Here's what we have to offer: 

 

LOVECRAFT P.I. imagines the macabre world of H.P. Lovecraft fused with noir detective novels of the 1920s and 1930s. In this occult world, ‘Ward’ Lovecraft serves as a Paranormal Investigator with the  Miskatonic Detective Agency. Short on temper and long on occult  knowledge, his unique talents are put to the test against an array of  fearsome creatures and villains.

D.W. Kann has been a tremendous friend to us and there's a rumor we're working on a crossover between these two fun universes (does it count as only a rumor if we've already finished scripts and are starting to work on the artwork?). You can read more about these comics here. To help you discover these awesome comics and get up to date, we're offering both books as add-ons.

  • Shot in the Dark (104 pages PDF) - $10
  • Shot in the Dark (104 pages physical) - $20
  • The Curious Case of ReAnimator (114 pages PDF) - $10
  • The Curious Case of ReAnimator (114 pages physical) - $20

We also offer the very popular vVurMzflessshhh Editions -  premium formatted books and fine art prints for the comic and music  industry - as add ons. vVurMzflessshhh Publishing was founded in 2006 by  VENIEN, an early pioneer of the USBM music scene and co-creator of the  legendary band VON (one of North American's first Black Metal bands in  1987).

VENIEN has been a strong friend of our comic from the very  beginning and has graciously agreed to illustrate and  produce exclusive collectibles available to you as add ons to  our Kickstarter. (To be honest, I just wanted to keep them all to  myself,  but he said we had to sell them and I know better than to argue  with someone whose day job includes the terms "black" and "metal".)

These premium giclèe prints and special edition comics are   extremely limited, so they're being offered on a first-come/first-go   basis. Once they're gone, they'll never be offered or re-printed again.

As an added bonus, each collectible comes with a download of an exclusive digital edition of a fully re-worked pulp version of a Miskatonic High issue (vVurMzflessshhh Edition). Completely re-designed  in homage to the pulp fiction and golden era of H.P. Lovecraft's work  in Weird Tales.

Giclees

These prints are 13"x19" on Epson 305 gsm/19mil Cold Press Natural Acid Free 100% Cotton Rag Fine Art Paper (except the large Aswang one, which is a large scroll print measuring 12"x36" on Prestige Washi Torinoko 110  gsm/170 micron (6.7mil) specialty paper). They comes with a custom-designed certificate with a small narrative description written by Miskatonic High writer Mike Shea. The print run has been limited to 13 and no more will ever be printed. The availability of these are limited, so if you want one, please let me know.

The print will be shipping separately from the rest of the rewards, so please add $5 for U.S. shipping or $10 for international shipping.

Premier Editions

  • The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #1 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is completely sold out!
  • The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #3 A & B (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) are sold out.
  • The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #4 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is sold out.
  • The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #5  (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is sold out.
  • The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #2 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is still available. Completely re-designed in  homage to the pulp fiction and golden era of H.P. Lovecraft's work   in Weird Tales. This premier edition variant features the rats image on   the cover and has an aged-black and white pulp appearance throughout  the issue. For the first time, these issues will be signed by series  writer Mike Shea. Also included is a download of the exclusive digital  edition of this version. These are limited and will go on a first-come/first-go basis. This will ship with the regular rewards, so  no additional shipping necessary.
  • The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #6 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is still available. Completely re-designed in homage to the pulp fiction and golden era of H.P. Lovecraft's work in Weird Tales. This premier edition variant features the Golgoroth image on the cover and has an aged-black and white pulp appearance throughout the issue. For the first time, these issues will be signed by series writer Mike Shea. Also included is a download of the exclusive digital edition of this version. These are limited and will go on a first-come/first-go basis. This will ship with the regular rewards, so no additional shipping necessary.

Give it a try

Here's a few pages of the story so you can see what it's like:

Attribution

"Hey guys, who did that amazing music in your video?"

Glad you asked, it's a track called Wizard by Jahzzar, which is available on the Free Music Archive. We edited the track to fit our video.

Lovecraft.” Here’s a bit from Paul’s review: “It brings a mismatched group of high schoolers together, throwing them against evil the likes of which you’d find in a dusty tome full of impossible to pronounce names. The beauty is in the execution. Despite some pretty heavy themes -- mounting madness, eternal torment, human sacrifice -- Mike Shea’s story stays fairly tongue in cheek. [Artist Ryan Mendoza] knows how to get his   Lovecraft on.” Read the full reviewMichael Logarta of Goshdarn Geeky said:"What better way to end the first season of Miskatonic High than with a bang—and by 'bang,' we mean a spectacular issue jam-packed with eldritch sorcery, tentacular delights, electric dance moves, voyages through space and time, daddy issues, mommy issues, friendship  issues, at least one perverted ghost, and more Lovecraftian weirdness than you can shake a questionably named cat at."Overall, Miskatonic High #6: Monster’s Ball is a pleasure from start to finish, and a spectacular way to end the series’ first season." Read the full reviewStretch goalsItems and variantsThe personalized metal bookmark measures 1.5" by 4" and features the Miskatonic High logo's tentacle to help you save your place in your favorite ancient tome. Each will be personalized with your name (we'll need you to respond to the survey within three days to get production going on these).We've got a few versions of our book: the 176-page softcover trade paperback (TPB) features all six issues, a new cover by Miskatonic High artist Ryan Mendoza, plus the 8-page bonus story! The 248-page hardcover features all six issues, a special Breakfast Club in Hell inspired cover, the bonus story, a variant cover gallery, the popular Teachers Lounge behind-the-scenes sections, a selection of Lovecraft stories and much more! The hardcover will also be offered in a limited bookplate version, signed and numbered by both writer Mike Shea and artist Ryan Mendoza.The vVurMzflessshhh Premium Edition features VENIEN's fully re-worked pulp version of the series in a disturbingly covered and oversized hardcover. This variant features the Gidim image on the cover and has an aged-black and white pulp appearance throughout. This edition is limited to 25 numbered copies and will never be reissued. It is also available in an exclusive Portfolio edition that includes the hardcover and a hardback folio case full of prints of VENIEN’s cover art and other extras. Limited to 25 ever and will never ever be reissued. PerksWe have more perks than you could shake your tentacle at (please don't though... that's the kind of thing that'll get you arrested): Add onsHere's what we have to offer:  LOVECRAFT P.I. imagines the macabre world of H.P. Lovecraft fused with noir detective novels of the 1920s and 1930s. In this occult world, ‘Ward’ Lovecraft serves as a Paranormal Investigator with the  Miskatonic Detective Agency. Short on temper and long on occult  knowledge, his unique talents are put to the test against an array of  fearsome creatures and villains.D.W. Kann has been a tremendous friend to us and there's a rumor we're working on a crossover between these two fun universes (does it count as only a rumor if we've already finished scripts and are starting to work on the artwork?). You can read more about these comics here. To help you discover these awesome comics and get up to date, we're offering both books as add-ons.
Shot in the Dark (104 pages PDF) - $10
Shot in the Dark (104 pages physical) - $20
The Curious Case of ReAnimator (114 pages PDF) - $10
The Curious Case of ReAnimator (114 pages physical) - $20
We also offer the very popular vVurMzflessshhh Editions -  premium formatted books and fine art prints for the comic and music  industry - as add ons. vVurMzflessshhh Publishing was founded in 2006 by  VENIEN, an early pioneer of the USBM music scene and co-creator of the  legendary band VON (one of North American's first Black Metal bands in  1987).VENIEN has been a strong friend of our comic from the very  beginning and has graciously agreed to illustrate and  produce exclusive collectibles available to you as add ons to  our Kickstarter. (To be honest, I just wanted to keep them all to  myself,  but he said we had to sell them and I know better than to argue  with someone whose day job includes the terms "black" and "metal".)These premium giclèe prints and special edition comics are   extremely limited, so they're being offered on a first-come/first-go   basis. Once they're gone, they'll never be offered or re-printed again.As an added bonus, each collectible comes with a download of an exclusive digital edition of a fully re-worked pulp version of a Miskatonic High issue (vVurMzflessshhh Edition). Completely re-designed  in homage to the pulp fiction and golden era of H.P. Lovecraft's work  in Weird Tales.GicleesThese prints are 13"x19" on Epson 305 gsm/19mil Cold Press Natural Acid Free 100% Cotton Rag Fine Art Paper (except the large Aswang one, which is a large scroll print measuring 12"x36" on Prestige Washi Torinoko 110  gsm/170 micron (6.7mil) specialty paper). They comes with a custom-designed certificate with a small narrative description written by Miskatonic High writer Mike Shea. The print run has been limited to 13 and no more will ever be printed. The availability of these are limited, so if you want one, please let me know.The print will be shipping separately from the rest of the rewards, so please add $5 for U.S. shipping or $10 for international shipping.Premier Editions
The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #1 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is completely sold out!
The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #3 A & B (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) are sold out.
The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #4 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is sold out.
The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #5  (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is sold out.
The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #2 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is still available. Completely re-designed in  homage to the pulp fiction and golden era of H.P. Lovecraft's work   in Weird Tales. This premier edition variant features the rats image on   the cover and has an aged-black and white pulp appearance throughout  the issue. For the first time, these issues will be signed by series  writer Mike Shea. Also included is a download of the exclusive digital  edition of this version. These are limited and will go on a first-come/first-go basis. This will ship with the regular rewards, so  no additional shipping necessary.
The fully re-worked pulp version of Miskatonic High Issue #6 (vVurMzflessshhh Edition) is still available. Completely re-designed in homage to the pulp fiction and golden era of H.P. Lovecraft's work in Weird Tales. This premier edition variant features the Golgoroth image on the cover and has an aged-black and white pulp appearance throughout the issue. For the first time, these issues will be signed by series writer Mike Shea. Also included is a download of the exclusive digital edition of this version. These are limited and will go on a first-come/first-go basis. This will ship with the regular rewards, so no additional shipping necessary.
Give it a tryHere's a few pages of the story so you can see what it's like:Attribution"Hey guys, who did that amazing music in your video?"Glad you asked, it's a track called Wizard by Jahzzar, which is available on the Free Music Archive. We edited the track to fit our video.

story:
Tänk om H.P. Lovecraft hade levt idag och bott i Uppsala! Hur hade hans berättelser sett ut då? Vår bok heter helt enkelt 1000 Ögon: Lovecraft och är vår hyllning till denna skräckens mästare. Vi tolkar några av hans berättelser och placerar dem i vårt 1000 Ögon-universum. 

Vi heter Daniel Thollin och Jonas Anderson och är bosatta i Uppsala. Jonas arbetar på heltid som frilansillustratör och gör barnböcker, grafisk formgivning och olika illustrationsuppdrag. Daniel är serietecknare och sjuksköterska. Daniel har tidigare arbetat på bl.a. Theos Ockulta Kuriositeter med Ola Skogäng och gjort The Evil Tree för det amerikanska serieförlaget Arcana. 

Seriebutiken Seriezonen i Uppsala firade 30 år som butik under 2010. Detta gav dem idén att ge ut en egen serietidning. De frågade oss om vi var intresserade att göra den. Resultatet blev 1000 Ögon: Tupilak. En 28-sidig tidning om Edgar och hans studentkompisar. Övernaturliga äventyr i ett Uppsala väldigt likt vårt eget. Tidningen släpptes på Kulturnatten samma höst och blev en succé. Det blev snart klart för oss att vi måste göra en fortsättning på Edgars äventyr. Detta ledde till att vi gav ut Hrafnir och Vondur under 2011. 2012 tog vi hjälp av våra serietecknarkompisar och gjorde Nyckeln. En antologitidning med en samling berättelser som cirklar kring en olycksbådande nyckel. 

När det var dags för 2013 års utgivning så ville vi göra något större. Vi bad författaren Anders Björkelid skriva ett 60-sidigt album som utspelar sig i det 1000 Ögon-universum som vi byggt upp under åren. Det blev Fylgia, en historia om identitet, Swedenborg och Uppsalahistoria. Den här gången var det Albumförlaget som gav ut den.

När vi satte oss för att planera nästa 1000 ögon-berättelse stod det klart för oss att vi ville gå tillbaka till det som inspirerat oss. Den amerikanske skräckförfattaren Howard Phillips Lovecraft med sina noveller om uråldriga varelser som bara väntar på att åter ta över jorden. Lovecraft har inspirerat inte bara oss utan otaliga författare, filmmakare, konstnärer och inte minst serieskapare.

1000 Ögon: Lovecraft ges ut av Albumförlaget, är 60 sidor lång och i traditionellt albumformat (21,5x29,5 cm). Daniel och Jonas skriver och tecknar två serier var denna gång. Boken består av fyra fristående berättelser. Skräckförfattaren Anders Fager (Samlade Svenska Kulter) har skrivit förordet till boken. Beräknad releasedag är 13 september 2014.

Berättelserna som vi har baserat serierna i denna bok är Statement of Randolph Carter, The Hound, Shadow over Innsmouth och The Shunned House. Boken tar dig med ner i underjorden och ut bland fiskmonster vid Upplandskusten. Du möter giriga gravskändare samt en stackars student som får hyra ett hus hon skulle hållt sig borta från. Om du kan din Lovecraft så kommer du att känna igen berättelserna men se dem i ett nytt ljus. Om du aldrig tidigare hört talas om H.P. Lovecraft så har du fyra skräckhistorier att se fram emot. Rysliga saker som utspelar sig idag, i Sverige, kanske nära där du bor...



Vår crowdfundingkampanj har flera syften. 
Först vill vi att vår bok ska nå ut till nya läsare.
För det andra behöver vi frigöra tid. Att göra serier är extremt tidskrävande. Genom ert stöd via Indiegogo så kan vi prioritera detta projekt och se till att det blir så bra som vi verkligen vill och slippa stressa fram det mellan andra jobb.


Du får möjlighet att köpa 1000 Ögon: Lovecraft direkt av oss utan mellanhänder, din bok blir signerad och du får den till ett schysst pris.
Rek. butikspris är ca 229:- och vi tar ca. 230:- inkl frakt för boken!
Vi skickar böckerna så att du får dom snarast efter releasen den 13/9.  
Förutom detta så erbjuder vi flera “rewards” med bonusar såsom orginalteckningar och liknande som är unika endast för denna kampanj. Exempel på dessa ser du nedan. Du kan läsa mer om dem i spalten till höger.

Når vi vårt mål på €1000 så kommer alla som stödjer kampanjen att få orginalnovellen The Statement of Randolph Carter på engelska, med illustrationer av Daniel och Jonas som en snygg pdf. 

Når vi €1300 får alla som stödjer kampanjen även novellen The Hound med illustrationer av Daniel och Jonas som pdf.

Når vi €1700 får alla som stödjer kampanjen även novellen The Shunned House med illustrationer av Daniel och Jonas som pdf. 

Når vi €2000 får alla som stödjer kampanjen även novellen The Shadow over Innsmouth med illustrationer av Daniel och Jonas som pdf. 

Du väljer vilken nivå du vill stödja, fyller i dina uppgifter och betalar med kreditkort eller Paypal. Indiegogo använder sig av Paypals säkra transaktioner, så att du kan känna dig trygg. Pengar dras direkt och när boken är färdig i september 2014 så får du dina produkter så fort brevbäraren kan springa.

Dela kampanjen, gilla facebook-sidan, hota dina vänner med evig förbannelse om de inte stödjer kampanjen.
Vi kommer under kampanjens gång att ha ett bord på Uppsala Comix 29–30/3 om man vill träffa oss och veta mer.

Tack för ditt stöd!


This a campaign for a Swedish comic book called 1000 Ögon: Lovecraft. The book is a 60 page anthology based on four of H.P. Lovecraft's short stories, but placed in the town of Uppsala, Sweden and in modern time. The stories are loosely based on Statement of Randolph Carter, The Hound, Shadow over Innsmouth and The Shunned House. The comics are written and drawn by Daniel Thollin and Jonas Anderson. The entire book is in swedish.


For any international orders please add €15 for shipping.

story:
He lives!

We are creating the world's first new/old superhero. Why? Because we got tired of our own complaining. Every time a new Spiderman comes out, or a new Batman we re-visit the same old argument - where are the new legends? The new myths? So we decided to create one. He's called Electric Man and the first issue will be out in October. Why Electric Man. We're glad you asked...

 In 2011 we made a movie about  comic books and the people who love them. It’s a film about a rare and valuable first issue that gets stolen and is pursued by various characters who all want it for their own reasons.

 Even though he was only ever supposed to be created for the film, people have been drawing him and asking about a ‘real’ Electric Man comic.   Electric Man has taken on a life of his own and we don't want to stop him. So now he has his own website www.electricmancomic.com

Writer Scott Mackay and artist Graham Manley are currently slaving away on the first issue as a labour of love. That first issue forms the foundation of a much larger tale - a story spanning decades and using the full potential of Electric Man's history. This iconic first issue will be available in October but how easily it is to get hold of depends on you.

 You can help Electric Man. We will print the first issue come what may - that's guaranteed. We are asking you to help us take it further; To help us put Electric Man in your local comic book store.

Just by pre-ordering your comic, or by buying a limited edition artwork you are ensuring a future for Electric Man. Who knows? You might even be saving the world.

The creators are Scott Mackay - the guy who wrote the movie and created Electric Man in the first place. Scott generally writes comics for the European market. Graham Manley the man responsible for the origin that you saw in the video. He's worked for 2000AD and a list of others too long for this page. Colouring will be by Jamie Grant - All Star Superman and another list of credits as long as your arm.

An initial three issue arc is planned and a world of discovery awaits beyond those.

 Jump aboard, catch the buzz.

What We Need & What You Get

First of all we need to create the comic and just as we did on Electric Man we intend to pay people for their creativity.

  Please contribute if you can but if you can't it doesn't matter. Of course you can use the share tools, or talk about it in your local comic store. Mention it to your friends, tweet about it - all of this stuff helps immensely. But you can also draw a picture, or get to work on that script. Electric Man is coming - why not join the ride?

As mentioned above the writer and artists are currently working for free. We'd like to pay them a little something to put this on a sustainable basis. So that Electric Man can be depended upon month after month. $5,000 over three issues.

Paper and Ink - Actually this is essential - we hope to cover the printing costs so that issue 2 is also guaranteed. But this helps with issue 1 and getting it into your local comic book store. $3,000

Getting it out to you - we guarantee to deliver your pre-ordered comic or art to your door and that means postage. Budgeting a dollar per = $1,000

The community website - where the Electric Man writers and artists (that's you) gather to discuss plot lines, villains and so on. We're not just creating a comic book here, we're creating a community filled with artists and writers and fans.

www.electricmancomic.com needs to be bigger so that we can all get involved. $1,000

 

AND WHAT DO YOU GET?

Well, the perks are lovely. The art is gorgeous and you get a fresh superhero on the block but we will also make you a part of it. Anyone (and we mean that) who contributes to Electric Man gets their name in the first issue. We are setting aside pages just to thank you. This is limited to the first issue - Electric Man will appear in your local comic store and when people pick it up to ask if you've read it all you have to do is smile and say 'Read it? I'm in it.'

The Impact

With your help we can create a legend. A new myth to stand beside the others. Check out the website and see how you can become involved in the creation of the comics from the ground up. We'll have eighty years of back story to fill in - and just as we said on the video, we're going to need help.

We made an indie movie about this comic and that movie goes global this coming fall. Check it out on youtube/IMDB or on our page www.electricmanmovie.com. Every journey begins with a first step. This is the first step towards a career in comics for some and for those who just want to read or watch this is the first step towards a glorious moment in the future -when you sit down and open a comic and you can say 'I was part of that'.

Other Ways You Can Help

Talk about it, visit the website, share this link. Team Electric needs all the exposure it can get. Facebook, Twitter - all of these assist Electric Man immensely. We have a blog running to let you know how things are going http://electricmancomic.com/blog/ but it is also there for you to help other people - why not have a look and see what we are up to? That helps more than you can know.

We have a blog running to let you know how things are going http://electricmancomic.com/blog/ but it is also there for you to help other people - why not have a look and see what we are up to? That helps more than you can know.

story:
Thanks for supporting our Superman We Can Be Heroes campaign. We’re at it again – this time featuring the whole Justice League. Check it out at fighthun.gr/JusticeLeague. 


Thanks to you - we did it again. 

So far, over 1,300 of you have supported this campaign, and raised well over $100,000 to bring hope and help to the Horn of Africa. We stood together and we stood strong. You've crushed our goal and on behalf of everyone at DC Entertainment, thank you for your generosity. 

Stand together, stand strong to fight the hunger crisis.

This fight is OUR fight — Super Heroes, creators and fans band together! Nothing can match the power and strength of a united front. Our mission: bring hope to the men, women and children in the Horn of Africa. That’s why the team of artists, animators, writers and creators behind Superman are in the thick of it. And that’s why we’ve put together a truly incredible roster of exclusive stuff—just for you.

One small act can make you a hero.

Not only are we more dedicated than ever to the fight against the hunger crisis, we’re also celebrating the 75th anniversary of the Man of Steel. And what could be a more honorable tribute than teaming up with our legions of fans to make one big difference for the men, women and children who need our help? Everything and anything you do will help. Just pick your perk, give today and you’ll help make a true difference.

It’s up to us—ALL of us

Get something good. Do something great. This is all about you guys. We’re doing what we love, to give you, the fans, what you love. Make it happen RIGHT NOW because you can only get this awesome, exclusive stuff RIGHT HERE.

So let’s stand up, stand strong and stand as one to fight the hunger crisis. And remember— heroes never give up. They give now!

If you have any questions check out our FAQ and Legal below or email us at wecanbeheroes@lapromo.com.  

Join your heroes - and be one yourself. It’s not just a message. It’s a reality. When you join in our campaign, you’re making a REAL difference for REAL people. It doesn’t take much. But it does take something, however big or small, from each and every one of us. Give today. It’s that simple. It’s that powerful. 

Signed Superman & the Legion

Grab your hardcover edition of Superman and the Legion of Super-heroes created and signed by two of today’s greatest talent – Gary Frank and Geoff Johns.

Superman Unchained T-Shirt

Exclusive We Can Be Heroes Superman Unchained t-shirt designed by Jim Lee. 

Exclusive We Can Be Heroes Cap

As one of the first designs to feature the Superman emblem introduced in DC COMICS – The New 52, the New Era Cap is soon to be a collector’s item. Get yours. 

Signed & Numbered SM Litho

Finally, a chance to put something up on those blank white walls. A Jim Lee signed and limited litho just for We Can Be Heroes.

Signed Death & Return of SM

The Death and Return of Superman is unforgettable. Get your hardcover copy signed by the men behind the mania—writer/artist Dan Jurgens and editor Mike Carlin. 

Jim Lee B&W Variant Edition

Creative genius Jim Lee signs a super sweet 1:300 black and white variant of the Superman Unchained series.

Lunch with Richard Donner and Geoff Johns

When we said we’re offering once-in-lifetime experiences, we meant it. Hang with two legends for the ultimate Superman sit-down!

Jim Lee Paints Your Wall

Litho a little too small for your art needs? How about a larger-than-life original, painted by Jim Lee himself?

Download Your Free Digital Badge

This campaign badge is only available right here. Right-click the image and select Save As, or just drag it to your desktop.

Post it to Facebook, your blog or anywhere you'd like to let the world know you've joined forces with Superman and the rest of the Justice League to fight the hunger crisis.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is it true that these perks can’t be shipped internationally?

A: Unfortunately, yes for most perks. We cannot ship any of the physical perks internationally for legal reasons. Both the Digital Download and the Video Chat with Jim Lee are open to international donors. We sincerely appreciate our international fans interest and we encourage them to still donate to We Can Be Heroes.

Q: What T-Shirt size should I order?

A: Our t-shirt sizes are all unisex. Women typically buy a size smaller than usual, while men generally buy the same size or one size larger. We’ve included the chart below to help you out. 

Q:  How often are the perks updated?

A: We usually refresh our perks on a weekly basis; but make sure to check back often because sometimes we can be unpredictable and you don’t want to miss out on some of the amazing perks this time around. Best way to know when new perks are out is to follow us @DCComics on Twitter and DC Comics on Facebook.  

Q:  Where does my donation go?

A: All donations are divided between our three nonprofit partners: International Rescue Committee, Mercy Corps and Save the Children to help fund their efforts on the ground in the Horn of Africa. Every donation, no matter how small, helps.

Q:  Can I donate more than once?

A: Yes. You can donate a thousand times. Not only will you get a cool new perk each time but you will help bring hope to the men, women and children in the Horn of Africa.

Q:  What if I have more questions?

A: We would love to hear from you. If you have questions related to the perks or a donation please feel free to email us at wecanbeheroes@lapromo.com. If you just have a general comment on the campaign please feel free to express yourself on our Indiegogo comment page.  

Rules & Restrictions

ALL PERKS: The perks above are subject to availability on www.indiegogo.com/at/wecanbeheroes from Tuesday, 6/11/13 at 9:45 a.m. ET/6:45 a.m. PT through Monday, 7/8/13 at 8:59:59 p.m. ET/11:59:59 p.m. PT. All applicable Warner Bros. rules and regulations apply. All perks, except the Digital Downloads and the Video Chat with Jim Lee are available only in the United States.

5 DIGITAL COMICS: This perk requires the donor to be registered (or to register) with comiXology. Redemption is subject to comiXology's Terms of Use. Downloads must be completed by 9/30/13.1-

YEAR PRINT SUBSCRIPTION: This perk requires the donor to be registered (or register) with DCComics.com. Subscription is subject to DC Comics Terms of Use. If the subscription title is cancelled, the remainder of the subscription will be fulfilled with an age appropriate title to be selected by DC Comics in its sole good faith discretion. Redemption must be completed by 9/30/13.

SUPERMAN DREAM BEDROOM: This perk includes a recliner, bean bag, storage ottoman, comfy throw, piggy bank, wall décor, throw, 2 twin sheet sets, 2 comforters twin, blanket, two beach towels, hooded towel, small plush, 31” Superman Figure, Superman Cape, Battle for Smallville, Battle of Metropolis and Black Zero Escape. No other Superman branded products may be substituted. All of the pieces will be shipped to one address which is able to accept large packages. Any potential assembly of these pieces is the sole responsibility of the donor. All elements of the Superman Dream Bedroom will be delivered to the donor by September 31, 2013. GET DRAWN INTO

LUNCH WITH RICHARD DONNER AND GEOFF JOHNS: This perk includes roundtrip economy transportation for donor and one travel companion from a major gateway airport near the donor's residence (final determination of the departure airport is at the sole discretion of Warner Bros.) to the actual destination city airport (final determination of the destination city and airport is at the sole discretion of Warner Bros). The trip must originate from within the 50 United States or the District of Columbia, with a destination of Los Angeles, CA. Also included is roundtrip destination ground transportation from airport to hotel in Los Angeles area (airport hotel-airport); mode of transportation to be determined by Warner Bros. In addition, two nights hotel accommodations at a hotel of Warner Bros.' choosing (includes costs for one room, double occupancy, room and tax only), a VIP tour of Warner Bros. Studios and DC Entertainment offices and transportation to and from the lunch with Richard Donner and Geoff Johns, and to and from the VIP tour of Warner Bros. Studios and DC Entertainment offices will also be provided. Date, time and location of the lunch is subject to Geoff Johns and Richard Donner's availability. The available dates for the lunch will be provided to the donor for selection and confirmation. The VIP tour of Warner Bros. Studios & DC Entertainment offices will also happen during that same window of time. 

JIM LEE PAINTS YOUR WALL: This perk is strictly limited to residents of the 50 United States and the District of Columbia. Date of the work is subject to Jim Lee’s availability. The available dates for the work will be provided to the donor for selection and confirmation. The space to be painted by Jim Lee will not exceed 10’ x 10’ and must be owned by the campaign donor. The subject of the painting will be a character from the DC Comics universe. The period of work will not exceed 8 hours. The space should be available for a full 24-hour period. The wall should be painted with a base coat. Guests are welcome to watch Jim Lee but should not interfere with his work.

TM & © 2013 WARNER BROS. ENTERTAINMENT INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. TM & © DC COMICS

story:
The Jump-off

First up if you're new to the world of Scrimshaw please continue below. If you're already acquainted with Hans and the rest of the crew and the octopus please scroll down to Issue #2.

Scrimshaw is a new comic created by award-winning screenwriter Eric Borden and drawn by the extremely talented Dave Mims. It blends a few of our favorite things together swords, science, and two hundred and fifty foot whales. Our first issue was a 40 page full color comic book. 25 story pages and 15 pages of the Captains Log. We introduced Issue #1 at Silicon Valley Comic Con back in March.  

The Story

The polar ice caps melted and the oceans rose. Nations were swept away in the deluge. World governments were fractured by war. Corporations filled the void. Millions died. Resources dwindled and flight became a thing of the past. Mankind was nearly destroyed. But life was clawed back through science and blood.

The story is a genre-mixing tale of old and new. It is a science and swordplay adventure on the high seas. It’s the story of a loose confederation of characters from the far-flung corners of the world who have come together as a family in order to find their way. With members hailing from Japan, Mexico, New Zealand, Norway, and American Samoa, the crew of the Runaway Horse has a colorful past and an uncertain future.

Follow Hans and the crew of the Runaway Horse as they make their way in the New Pacific, a world of ruthless business, uneasy truces, and shifting alliances. A world abided by steel, marked by mutation, and at the mercy of the violent sea.


MEET THE CREW

                                   His Mutant Valet - Saigo

                          The First Mate – Mariposa Zanabria

                           The Captains Wife – Katsuko Tanaka

         Your Ordnance Technician – Ngaire Te Piki Kotuku Solomon

           Deckhand Extraordinaire – Tapuitea “Herman” Mafulele

THE TEAM

Eric Borden is a screenwriter whose preferred genres are drama, horror, and anything that will hold an edge. He is the author of many shorts, a few features, a couple comics (Dead West, Blood Game), and one book that he’ll finish even if it kills him. One of those features, Fever is currently in development with Blanc-Biehn Productions. He lives and works in Las Vegas, Nevada.

Dave Mims is a graphic artist with over ten years experience. Dave has attended both the Art Institute of Pittsburgh and the Academy of Design. He's the lead artist on the comic books, The Infected (Hartman) and All Hallow's Eve (Luckman). He lives and works in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. 

Mark has thoroughly Immersed himself in the production of sci-fi/horror themed comics as well as movie media production. He transplanted from the southeast to the Las Vegas valley ten years ago in order to slow down.

Rashad Tabeb is a firm believer in the willful suspension of disbelief, and that there is not much better than a great story. A lover of nature, manga, anime, knives, gear, and of course beer. He lives in Las Vegas with his wife and two children.


ISSUE #2

After Silicon Valley an awesome thing happened. Scrimshaw was picked up for distribution by Alterna Comics. This is great because it will open up the potential for  expanding the audience of a project we're very passionate about. Our deal with them is for digital distribution with an opportunity to print a collected graphic novel every third issue for distribution to comic shops nationwide. But this opportunity will be based on performance and how well our little story does out there in the big, bad world. 

That's where you, the readers who helped us get this thing off the ground, as well as the ones joining us right now, come in. 


Issue #2 is already in production. In fact here's a look at the first page: 

Who doesn't want more of that?  


Where Does the Money Go?

Now we're launching this campaign for just one reason. So that we can print Issue #2.  We established the $4400 goal for a couple of reasons. 

Reason #1 - $4400 allows us to print enough comics that we can fulfill our Issue #2 promise to our awesome readers and still have enough to sell at our next Comic Con. These sales allow us to go to work on Issue #3. 

Reason #2 - $4400 is in the ballpark of what our first printed distribution run with Alterna might cost and we want to show them we can hit that number even before digital distribution in September. Our goal is to get Scrimshaw on those comic store shelves for everyone to read.

(I say ballpark because Indiegogo does take a small % for facilitating our mission.) 

Now this is where the beauty of Indiegogo becomes clear. Since this is a flexible funding campaign even if we don't hit our goal, we're going to put what we do raise to work, which means you will get Issue #2 in your hands regardless. That's the point of our whole campaign, to get the book to readers and be able to continue telling the story. Plain and Simple, right?

What Do We Get?  

Since this campaign is essentially a pre-sale for Issue #2, we're offering perks to get Scrimshaw in as many hands as possible and help put you in touch with the world and the characters. 

The Impact

Still with us? Great because this is the most important part of Scrimshaw, the message. Scrimshaw is about the where our world could be headed.  It tells the story of a possible future. One in which the world has been affected by the effects of global warming, genetic and agricultural manipulation, and all-out war between the so-called superpowers.  While it’s a fantasy adventure with a diverse cast of characters, it is also firmly rooted in the real. Issues like global warming, overfishing of the oceans, corporate exploitation, political over-reach, and race relations are tackled head-on. The story also revolves around one of the oldest and most maligned traits that mankind possesses, our ability to make war. Scrimshaw imagines a future that could become very real given the current state of affairs in our world. 
It's our hope that this little story might spark in someone the wish to ask why? And that maybe in asking the question the answer brings them to a place where they can aid the change that the world so desperately needs. 

Risks and Challenges

Luckily this isn't the first comic book for any of us. We've been up the mountain before. Still there are challenges with bringing any artistic endeavor into being. We're confident that barring any unforeseen circumstances or swift and mighty deathblows to the team, we can  deliver Scrimshaw Issue #2 in all it's glory in June of 2016. Not coincidentally that's when we plan on going to Amazing Las Vegas Comic-Con, so the book better be finished.
