story:
r. j. paré

I'm a co-founder, projects director, staff writer and spokesman for Speakeasy Primates - a cooperative creators studio. I was born in Windsor, Ontario, Canada and currently reside five hours north of his hometown - in Orillia. However, I have, at various times, lived all over this wonderful land of hockey pucks, maple syrup and the best damn beer on the planet! 

I've been writing, editing, lettering & publishing underground comics, newsletters and Zines for over twenty years. My current e-Zine, RKYV ONLINE, has enjoyed web publication since 2006 and serves as a showcase for developing writers and artists. 

Buddha Monkey began as a series of fun & dynamic drawings that artist Stan Nelson submitted to RKYV ONLINE. They represented, for him, a sort of personal mascot. Being an avid Hacky Sacker Stan’s early drawings of Buddha Monkey involve him playing with and repairing his Hacky Sack. I approached Stan about creating a back-story for the character and we were off! Stan’s images of Buddha Monkey inspired me to write, what I hope, will be a successfull and entertaining world for this interesting character to live in.

Synopsis

Then:

The setting is an alternate history in which the Japanese Emperor flees the destruction of Hiroshima and Nagasaki, with his forces, and sets up his government in Manchurian controlled China. In order to ensure his survival he enters into a pact with the Dark Kitsune, demons of the void. 

A small brave monkey is transformed, by the Buddha, in order to save the world from the Dark Kitsune and their dread minions, the Kabuki Samurai. 

Now:

Manchurian Japan is determined to expand and encompass all of China. Our monkey travels the globe with the performing Shaolin Monks to help spread good will for China as they seek allies to thwart the Japanese Emperor. They are pursued by the Kabuki Samurai, relentlessly.

Ultimately:

Buddha Monkey must seek out allies, champions imbued with powers from other benevolent “higher powers”. A war is brewing, in the heavens and on earth, between the forces of good and evil.

Goals

The purpose of my IndieGoGo campaign is to raise the funds necessary to print & distribute the 1st three issues of this exciting comic adventure!

So far the book has been previewed as black and white Ashcan Edition mini-comics at small press conventions in Columbus [Ohio], Detroit [Michigan] and Toronto [Ontario, Canada]. With the funds from this campaign we will be able to offer full-size, full-colour editions of the 1st three issues for sale to a broader audience.

The Impact of Your Investment in Our Comic

Speakeasy Primates is collective banner our cooperative creators studio uses in the marketing of our collaborative efforts. Once we've reached our goal, it will help establish our production method. We formed Speakeasy Primates  as a workshop where indie writers and artists could trade time & talents with collaborators, rather than having to hiring each other, in order to complete creative projects.

Should this campaign be successful it will help pave the way for future projects.

Shipping

Shipping for supporters who live in the US & Canadahas been included in the price of each perk. For International supporters, a small additional charge is listed below the perk to help cover the extra cost of shipping. Please make sure to include this cost in your contribution, or I won't be able to ship your order to you!

Other Ways To Help

Even if you can't contribute funds (I do know what it's like to be broke!), you can still help the creative team on Buddha Monkey by spreading the word about this campaign. Tweet about it, post about it on Facebook...  Every little bit helps!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/rjpare

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/groups/6174343940/

story:
Who we are?

 

Hi everyone, we are Caperuza Roja, a group of young graphic artist who make comic projects. We started Ana Zeppelin four years ago. Until now we made 176 pages, six chapters, that comprising the Part 1 of the story. Here you can read/download by free the first part of Ana Zeppelin... yeap, by free!

https://medibang.com/book/4z1603201326096340000650846



The band is made up by:

Our master draw or first pencil is Miyo. She’s is the expert of the group for drawing. With more than fifteen years of experience, she can presume she worked for the best on Japan like the legendary SNK Corporation. But now, we convinced her to take long holydays on the Indie way production environment.

Pável Kenika is another master of drawing. He is our inker and also have another personal comic projects. He worked with Edgar Clement, one of the main characters of the comic industry at Mexico. He's still young, an artist whit a brilliant future.

Any. She helps us with the digital edition and corrections of the scanning pages.  Her work is important for get a detailed quality on the final document.

We also receive help from other professionals like Adaliza Zárate in translation and covers, DanielTenorio as inker or Valente Espinoza as our internet shaman.

What is Ana Zeppelin?

Is our first graphic novel. Ana Zeppelin is the story about a 13 years old girl who lives at Mexico City in the beginning of the nineteen’s. Her traditional and childish life style changes when she listens for first time the rock grunge music. Since then, she tries to learn to play rock music and starting to make her own songs in the middle of bullying and classist teenager environment.
Rock music is one of the central topics of the novel. We mention, literal or with graphic tributes, mostly of our favorite bands like Nirvana, Pearl Jam, Pixies, Sonic Youth, Led Zeppelin, The Doors, David Bowie, The Beatles, Rolling Stones, Elvis and many more.
The novel has 21 chapters. We already finish, complete in spanish and english, 6 of it. The last means 167 pages. The aim is finish the next six chapters on September 2016. At Spanish an English version. We of estimate the total number of pages on more than 150. Like you could see is a huge work to do. The novel is made by traditional techniques: pencil, ink and paper. But also, we try to use the new technologies like sophisticate software for comic manufacturing and draw edition.

The Characters
Ana. She ir the main character. The story started whit her when she has 13 years old. In the II Part  she pass from be the popular between her rich partners to meet new people at the popular low class.
Ana have a cool uncle, Armando. He is the principal Ana's mentor for rock'n roll and ethical guide. The story of Armando is complex and includes revolutionary incursions, communist ideas and tragic situations. By the way, he is a master playing guitar:
The Ana's rock band is formed by Jafet (first guitar), Saul (second guitar), Julio (bass) and Tomas (drums).
The girldfriends of the members of the band are also important at the story, specially Mercedes. She teach Ana how to dress and survive at the dangerous jungle of the rich guys highschool.
At the part two, another important characters start to play a principal rol, like Alberto (Ana's boyfriend) or Lola (guitar of Ana's new band).

Why we need funding???
Publish comics implies hard work, constancy and resources. We need funding to continue our work and crowdfunding represents a useful alternative scheme. The money you invest will be use in the following way:
As you can see, the funding is not only a direct benefit four us, we also use the funds to pay the job of our external contributors. Moreover, we are planning to invite ten young comic artist to make chapter covers and Ana Zeppelin fan art that will be include in the Part II.
If we cannot arrive to our goal, the funds obtained will be priority used for the rewards and production.

Gallery art

                              



    We will up-load more images at the gallery art in the next days!!!!

    The best part: the rewards!!!

    From $10. Low resolution copy in PDF  (parts I and II). Your name at the acknowledgements section.

    From $15. Low resolution PDF (parts I and II) and 2 wallpapers. Also, your name at the acknowledgements section.

    From $20. High resolution PDF (parts I and II) and 5 wallpapers. 50% discount when you buy the hardcopy of Ana Zeppelin. Your name at the acknowledgements section.

    From $30. The hard copy of the part I and all the previous digital rewards . Your name at the acknowledgements section.

    From $50. All the previous digital rewards. Hard copy of the Part I and the Ana Zeppelin Memorabilia edition (20 illustrations full color, LP format). Special thanks at the acknowledgements section.

    From $100. All the digital previous rewards (discounts for Part III), hard copies of Part I, Part II and Ana Zeppelin Memorabilia. Cameo of yourself at some page of Part II. Special thanks at the acknowledgements section.

    From $500 or more. All the previous digital rewards (discounts for all the other books of Caperuza Roja, present and future), hard copies of Ana Zeppelin parts I and II DELUXE edition signed by the authors, the Ana Zeppelin Memorabilia. Cameo of you and other person you you choose. Special poster signed by the authors. A page at the book with a special appreciation for you.
    Additionally, we will give you two free tickets for the “27 rockstars club concert” at the hell on the Apocalypses final day… well the last thing is an exaggeration but remember ROCK never dies!!!


    The impact

    We are enthusiastic about this comic because here, in Mexico, graphic novels are scarce things. So, we really hope make the difference and inspire other young artists from Mexico and Latinamerica to start this type of projects.
    Your contribution will be very important for us, to continue working and share whit all of you the results. The last time we made a Crowfunding we fail in our economic goal, but we obtained not only experience, also we met great people that until now follow this project. We also have nice surprises for our founders of our firts try in Indiegogo. So, go ahead, be part of our band!!!


    Risks and challenges

    The principal obstacle is the time/cost balance production. If we have less resources, we should give more time to other gainful activities and the finish dead line of Ana Zeppelin is more far away.

    We are patient and steadfast,but if you are part of this project it will be more easy. The next five months the team will be work on drawing and publish the second part of Ana Zeppelin. For the last, we find a small house in the country side of Mexico to live and draw. We are sure togheter we can make our goal.


    Another ways you can help

    Please, if you can not help us with funds you can share and promote this project in your social networks (Twitter, Facebook, Tapastic, Subcultura, Medibang).

    https://www.facebook.com/Caperuza-Roja-Studio-1432924280259288/?fref=ts

    https://twitter.com/FrannyKristell?lang=es

    https://medibang.com/book/4z1603201326096340000650846

    https://tapastic.com/series/The-Ana-Zeppelin-story

    http://anazeppelin.subcultura.es/

    You can also use the tools Indiegogo's have for this purpose.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jeff, I am a father of twins, a pastor, and a student of philosophy and theology in Mississauga, Ontario, and I have been drawing comics for as long as I could remember. For the past two years (shortly after my kids were born) I've been drawing Two by Two, which is a mostly true account of what it's like to raise twins while going to school and working full time. It's a hectic life, but it's our life, and it's usually hilarious.

I am putting together a book of 100 comic strips and selected blogs from my website, as well as some sketches I've done in my spare time. The book will be full colour and will hopefully be available in March if this campaign is successful.

My comic strip appeals to a wide range of people but has often been said to be encouraging to new parents and parents of multiples in particular.  This book would not only be a huge milestone in my life and something off my bucket list, but would also be a great gift for a number of people were it availabe in print.

What We Need & What You Get

I am raising $6000 to print a run of 300 books to sell online and at different comic/art shows. All the donations we get will go directly to the cost of printing and promoting the book. I have received various quotes from different companies, but will be printing through Sure Print and Design in Toronto, ON. Approx. $5300 will go towards the printing and the rest will go towards the indie go go fee and a facebook ad campaign promoting the book.

For your donation you will receive any number of prizes and perks spanning from a thumbs up, original artwork, and a fancy dinner.  Check out the perks section to see what strikes your fancy.

On the off chance that I do not raise all the funds needed to do a run of 300 I will do a shorter run of books to ensure that everyone who has ordered one will receive one and so there is little to no risk of donating! On the chance that I do not raise enough to print any books, those who ordered books will receive a digital copy of the book, an apology, and some original artwork signed by me.

The Impact

As I said before this is a huge bucket list item for me.  It's also a great gift idea for new parents and parents of multiples. While this comic is unlikely to make any significant medical or engineering breakthroughs, or be responsible for any other world/paradigm altering discoveries, it's a great way to spread some joy in the world, and I think we can all agree there is not enough joy.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate you can still be a huge help!  The key to this campaign's success is people hearing about it! Please tell your friends about it, post it on your facebooks, twitters, instagrams, and what have you.  And check out the Indie Go Go info sharing options!  Thanks so much for your help!

story:
Hello folks!

Dan Nokes here from 21st Century Sandshark Studios with the first of 4 planned Indie a Go-Go projects for 2013!  This first one is for our critical and biggest commercial success: ADAM AND EVE BIZARRE LOVE TRIANGLE IN THE ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE!  This undead comedy buddy romp started out as two seperate volumes released between 2011 and 2012.

Well now, hopefully with your help and aid we will be able to compress 244 pages of original artwork from your's truly with new bonus artwork and material into ONE VOLUME!  Yes with this campaign we are aspiring to bring ADAM AND EVE: BIZARRE LOVE TRIANGLE IN THE ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE- THE COMPLETE UNDEAD OMNIBUS to life!

So whats in it for you?!

Glad you asked!  

In addition to bragging rights that you helped fund, back and show support for one of the best lauded and loved indie zombie comics out there!  We are handing out some swanky prizes and schwag according to how much you donate.

Everything from sighned prints and books, to sketchcards, to original art and even custom commissions can be yours IF THE PRICE IS RIGHT!!

In addition we will handing out print bonuses for milestones in our contribution levels!  In short if we reach certain goals, people who donated will recieve ADDITIONAL THANK YOU GIFTS!  

Still not sure on this whole thing???

How about some of these critical type quips about ADAM AND EVE to help you make a decision...

"The artwork reminds me somewhat or the old cartoons that used to be on MTV late night television, which I really like.  The art style with the brilliant mix of brutal and comedic genius writing works perfectly." 

Paul Cheeze Good

CRAZY MAN RAMBLINGS

 

"Its like the Walking Dead...But with humor"

Ric The Real Stooge

THIS WEEK IN BULLSHIT

 

"Awesome read"

Nick Davis

ALT WORLD

 

"Its funny, its tounge-in-cheek, and its very smart!"

Harry Cee

THE NEXT ISSUE

 

 "It’s just as cool as it sounds."

Denise Dutton

ATOMIC POPCORN

"

Do not kill the dog!"

Don Smith

THE JACKYL'S HEAD

 

"One of the books I read in 2011...:

Chuck "Dash" Parker

CHUCKDASHPARKER.COM

So what else do you friggin need?!?

How about previews from these books to get a lowdown on what ADAM AND EVE: BIZARRE LOVE TRIANGLE IN THE ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE is all about!

http://issuu.com/21sandshark/docs/adam_and_eve

http://issuu.com/21sandshark/docs/adam_and_eve_preview_2

 

Well that's it from me!  Please show some support for the almighty 21 Sandshark and your's truly and back this worthwhile creative baby for me!  Thanks as always!

Dan Nokes

Creative Director

21st Century Sandshark Studios

www.21sandshark.com

story:
Are you a huge fan of ZOMBIES?! 

"Zombieland", "ZNation" and Comics like "DeadWorld", "The Walking Dead"? Then this is for you! "Zombies We're Human Too" 

This is a 100pg Graphic Novel that will be made into a Feature Film!                                        It is 95% Complete ALREADY! 

Originally to showcase Charles Casey, Sonya Thompson, and Larry Mainland of The Walking Dead TV Show, the story has morphed and is now about.  

Three kids foraging for food who get spooked by zombies and chased into an abandoned  warehouse. The youngest of the three is terrified, so to calm him down, the older two kids start picking out zombies they see and make up funny stories about them: Who they were, how long they lasted and how they died in a funny way. This is a completely new spin on the zombie genre.

THE BOOK!

Zombies We're Human Too is a 100 page graphic novel (the core story is 20 pages). Each one will be Autographed by Series Creator! The main story will be in color with the zombie stories being in Black and white. This will be available as a digital Pdf file, printed Softcover edition and a Hardcover edition. This is a unique take on the Zombie Genre that tell stories about zombies BEFORE they become zombies! This is a continuous story, however there are (10) short stories from different writer/artist teams that seamlessly continue the main story!

Main Story
(w)Austin Janowsky and (a) Mauricio Campetella's Zombies We're Human Too
Three kids out foraging during a zombie apocalypse. While looking for food they get spooked by zombies!

They get chased out of the house and down the road to an abandoned warehouse. 



The youngest is panicking a little to to calm him down the other two look out the window and pick out zombies they see, making up stories of who they were, how long they lasted and how they died, sometimes in a funny way!

 



BACKER REWARDS!!!



THE CREATORS!



 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

None! The book is 100% complete. We have had a lot of people asking for a hardcover edition so we decided to run this campaign ahead of us launching our campaign for Volume 2 on February 15, 2020. We have some really cool stretch goals if we surpass our 100% funding!

Once this campaign is finished, we will go to print and will be able to fulfill Reward Tiers in a month or so depending on which reward tier you choose!!

Thank you so much for your support and watch out for zombies, they're everywhere!

Best,
Creator/Writer
Austin Janowsky

story:
Thane’s strong. REALLY STRONG. Stomping monsters and parkouring through the Terapin strata, he goes unmatched. But he’s a prisoner without the one in charge of his sex drive and FIGHTING SPIRIT...The id.

Regaining his id means reclaiming freedom, and Thane will be damned if he rots away in the pit depths. Life is about making the big bucks, getting laid, or becoming the world‘s next MEGALOMANIAC! Consider the challenges conquered, so long as he beats the sensual orderly on duty.

Will Thane resist the Romancer?

 

 

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

Velthaneus is a finished product. That's right! Done! However, the cost of printing is no small fee. Crowdfunding is the most cost-effective way to get Velthaneus out into the world. IndieGoGo enables me to budget this project. Based on how hard you all push for the rewards and goals will allow for an even more extensive and creative delivery of Velthaneus' first installment. A stellar beginning for the issues to come.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Having run four successfully-funded Kickstarter projects, I am very familiar with crowdfunding. I have published artwork in several issues of Mega Visions and created an original character for NZXT with his own manga! I am used to working at a professional level and understand the importance of meeting deadlines. 

Having said that, I have no control over the speed at which the product is printed and shipped, but I am confident I will be able to deliver a stunning product within the targeted time period.

story:
Borderline 

It's my very great pleasure introduce to you: BORDERLINE. it's a 24-page comic written, drown and coloured by me. It take place in a dream trip where there is a thin border line between light and darkness.

Story

A book that conceals a secret world...The writer David Noel know his own fears and will travel to a dark city in search of his redemption but his fears will follow him on the journey. What will uncover in the end?

.if you like and want support me. share this link http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/borderline--2/x/3107929

story:
Eisen Blume is meisan 's collection of artwork collect morethan160 +illustration in 171 page.This is Hugh collection of art collect more than 5 years of work.

book size is a4/fullcolor

more update to come

Cover/you will see thickness of book
 back cover
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
t-shirt and notebook
 
complete set
notebook

ecobag

t-shirt

black and white artbook agnus dei

back cover

inside

About name Eisen blume 

 
This name came from German language mean 'iron flower'
I would like to present something that have strong feel of masculine
and delicate feel of feminine so I combine two word that seem in opposite thing.
Iron is mineral which represent strong feel.On the contrary flower is something more fragile,like woman that need someone to protect.
 
In real life,my personality is kind of mixing between two gender,
because I'm in middle between my brother and sister.I take dad as my role model and my mom always beside me,
So I've personality of men and woman in the sametimes,
I may work hard and my dream similar to man dream,but I'm sensitive inside.So it's became name of this artbook.
 
and it's involve with my style also.I like style that you didn't know man or woman draw it or it's hard to know gender of artist who draw it.So I try to take that route for a long time.I try more unisex approach.You may see in some picture in this artbook I try to use western style combine with manga which is oriental.I think western represent strong style of masculine but oriental is delicate feel of feminine like Yin-Yang which law of nature that have harmony.Because of something opposite that can make this world can move in balance way.It's like my root from landscape architecture faculty,nature and building that have contrast in context but as designer you have to making it going well together.
 
 
Meisan's profile
 
Meisan is Thai-Chinese illustrator graduate from architecture field.Meisan's work has been feature in various media both Thai and international.Now doing illustration work and teaching illustration in Thailand.
 
This artbook has successfully print and sold in comic convention in Thailand,but I'd like to expand to international audience as well.i've few stock left,and printing cost is so high because the book is very thick which I can't afford 2nd reprint without support,and frankly is I didn't know real demand for my artbook also.So I decide to start crowdfunding at indiegogo,because I manage to go to international convention this year if I didn't do this method I can't find fund to do that.
 
you can view more of my art here. http://meisan.deviantart.com/
 
or at my personal homepage. http://www.meisanmui.com/
 
Milestone and Stretch goal
500$ goal reach Add new postcard from 5 to 7 design for perk g and beyond.
750$ goal  reach add new postcard from 7 to 10 design for perk g and beyond.
1000$ goal reach add new postcard design from 10 to 15 for perk g and beyond.
1500$ fund raising goal complete for Thankyou I will draw new illustration And make it limited print for perk g and beyond.
2,000$ stretch goal reach.I will add full color  tutorial and process booklet a5 size for perk g and beyond.
3,000$ stretch goal reach.I will shift from a5 size booklet to a4 for perk g and beyond.
3,500$ stretch goal reach.I will add pocket size of calendar,add more page to tutorial booklet for perk g and beyond.
4,000$ stretch goal reach.I will add plush doll keychain,add more page to tutorial booklet.for perk g and beyond.
5,000$ stretch goal reach.I will add Dust jacket. And slip case design for both soft cover and hardcover edition.for perk g and beyond.
8,000$ stretch goal reach.I will making 6 new art for calendar  and making calendar available for perk g and beyond.
10,000$ stretch goal reach.Perk I oasis and up will recieve another random watercolor painting.
15,000$ secret need to unlock.I need to reach this goal first to tell you what you will get.
 
estimate delivery date is include commission timeframe.You can track commission process in my homepage..if it has long queue I will send package to you first.
 
If you can't help funding,as least  help me spread word to any social media I will feel so grateful.

story:
Short Summary

I am a second year UVic student in the Visual Arts Department working towards a career as a graphic novelist. 

I would really love to start my career by publishing a little more informally, and moreso for myself than profit. I have a lot of plans for future comics, but those are still on the back burner. A lot of comic artists start off with short stories, so I figured it would be a fun thing to try.

With your help, I will be able to start my career and portfolio so that when I graduate I will have a published book under my belt as well as fundraising skills.

What We Need & What You Get

I set the goal as $1500. This funds the set up for LightningSource, ISBN, and the espresso book machine ($500), then copies of the comic ($900), supplies ($75), and misc expenses/perks ($25)

If you donate...

$1 - Good Karma and a thank you email!
$5 - Your name in the thank you section of the book, plus all previous perks.
$30 - A drawing signed and emailed to you, plus all previous perks.
$100 - A signed copy of the book, plus all previous perks.

If I don't reach my goal, I will put towards as much money as I can to pay for copies of the book. If I make less than $500, then I will have to do LightningSource setup and whatnot on my own, using whatever I can make to get the espresso machine set up and a few copies of the book.

The Impact

My project will hopefully be something new and interesting that people will feel frightened by, weirded out, or just plain confused. I want to create a world to immerse readers and get people a little out of their comfort zone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Promote me on your social networking sites! I'm a poor art student and I totally understand if you can't contribute. Cruising my site and sharing it with your friends would really help me out!

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

It's that time of year!  As we prepare for the upcoming holidays and shopping for for gifts and goodies for those loved ones, everyone here at Dynamite and Dynamic Forces want to wish our friends, fans, and family "happy holidays!"  And what better way to say that than with new, incredibly rare, VAMPIREALLA METAL COVER EDTIONS by the COMIC MASTERS!

VAMPIRELLA #1 LTD ED METAL COVER!

J. SCOTT CAMPBELL 

ALEX ROSS

VENGEANCE OF VAMPIRELLA #1 METAL COVER!

FRANK CHO

LUCIO PARRILLO 

VAMPIRELLA #2 METAL COVER!

STANLEY "ARTGERM" LAU 

These extremely low print run metal edition comics are only available in 2020 here on this crowd funder! If you want them in your collection in time for the holidays, the tiny print run will be available first come first served during this special event!  Each has a real Metal cover that shines like a new car and is incredibly reflective!  These books are without a doubt some of the rarest and most collectible covers available today! 

 

GIFTS FOR THE COLLECTOR IN YOUR LIFE

Everyone has a comic or trading card collector in their lives.  And it is so HARD to shop for that person.  They don't want socks or underwear and you have no idea what to buy them.  I mean how can you know what is in their collection?  

What is the answer to this collecting conundrum?  This IndieGoGo is the answer!  We are reaching into our vaults and giving fans something special at incredible value prices.  Whatever you collect we have you covered!

RARE COMICS!

SIGNED COMIC BOOKS!

HAND DRAWN REMARQUED SKETCH COVERS!

CGC GRADED COMICS!

IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND TRADING CARDS!

BRAND NEW LIMITED EDITION VAMPIRELLA METAL COVERS!


ALL ORDERS SHIP IN A GIFT BAG!

Take the worry about wrapping out of the equation!  Every one of these collectible orders will ship in a special holiday bag ready to give as a gift!  These collectibles are ready to go from box to under the tree in minutes flat!  

 

ORDERS SHIP AS THEY ARE RECEIVED!

We know how important it is for gifts to arrive on time and we are shipping once a week through the end of this campaign on 12/13!  That means everything should be to you in time for holiday gatherings and events!

story:
Summary

This project was created to help educate and explain what Multiple Sclerosis is for young adults, youth, and anyone else wanting more information on this debilitating, and sometimes confusing disease. We wanted to make something visual, with a storyline, and came up with illustrating in a graphic novel format.

I'm John Medeiros, a writer and graphic designer. I have also been creative director of other graphic novels, worked on websites, new media, journalism and parenting. I also have Multiple Sclerosis. I was diagnosed 10 years ago and spent a lot of time researching what MS is all about, and to be honest it would have been nice to have something in a story form to educate me. It's just how I like to learn. So, I decided to write a story and get some great illustrators on board to create this graphic novel.

Synopsis

The story is written from the point of view of Sarah, an 18 yr old young woman living in a mid sized city. Sarah woke up one morning with numbness in her lower limbs, and as the days went by the numbness spread to other parts of her body, along with other uncomfortable symptoms such as a crushing tightness to her chest.

The story then follows the journey from all the tests one goes through for a diagnosis, some very unpleasant such as the dreaded Lumbar Puncture (Spinal Tap) and what MS is all about and the implications of having the disease in different stages.

The text is written, fact checked and ready to go.


    The Impact

    Between 2 and 3 million people a year are affected globally with Multiple Sclerosis, with a higher percentage growing each year in younger people from 14-21. There is no definitive reason why it happens. There is no cure.

    The graphic novel is an honest and open story about what can happen and helps someone going through the symptoms, or friends and family, understand what a person living with the disease goes through to be diagnosed, and how it can affect their lives on a daily basis. It is written in a way that is easy to understand and helps explain the sometimes complex information available, in a way that everyone can learn from.

    What will the funds be used for?

    40% of the funds will go towards the illustrators in creating the images for the graphic novel. 35% will go for printing costs. The remaining 25% will go towards fullfilling the perks and for Indiegogo, Paypal and other fees. Lettering and graphic design to get it print ready is all taken care of. If we manage to get passed our goal, fingers crossed, we will introduce stretch goals and more perks, while improving page count, print quality, adding full colour, and setting up an educational website to help people get more information in a way that is easy to understand and interactive.
      We have kept the perks simple and easy to choose from. The option is also there to donate without a perk, but always with our gratitude. 

      Risks & Challenges 

      If the full funding doesn't happen here, we will use what is available to develop as much of the graphic novel as possible in the hopes to use the updated material to obtain finishing costs for the project from other funding agencies and/or companies.

        Can't contribute now but want to help?

        Made it this far but can't contribute? No worries and we appreciate you taking the time to look this over. It would be great if you use the handy sharing tools that Indiegogo provides to spread the word about this project and help us reach our goal. You rock and you know it.

  The Impact Between 2 and 3 million people a year are affected globally with Multiple Sclerosis, with a higher percentage growing each year in younger people from 14-21. There is no definitive reason why it happens. There is no cure.
The graphic novel is an honest and open story about what can happen and helps someone going through the symptoms, or friends and family, understand what a person living with the disease goes through to be diagnosed, and how it can affect their lives on a daily basis. It is written in a way that is easy to understand and helps explain the sometimes complex information available, in a way that everyone can learn from.

What will the funds be used for?40% of the funds will go towards the illustrators in creating the images for the graphic novel. 35% will go for printing costs. The remaining 25% will go towards fullfilling the perks and for Indiegogo, Paypal and other fees. Lettering and graphic design to get it print ready is all taken care of. If we manage to get passed our goal, fingers crossed, we will introduce stretch goals and more perks, while improving page count, print quality, adding full colour, and setting up an educational website to help people get more information in a way that is easy to understand and interactive.
We have kept the perks simple and easy to choose from. The option is also there to donate without a perk, but always with our gratitude. 

  Risks & Challenges  If the full funding doesn't happen here, we will use what is available to develop as much of the graphic novel as possible in the hopes to use the updated material to obtain finishing costs for the project from other funding agencies and/or companies.

  


Can't contribute now but want to help?Made it this far but can't contribute? No worries and we appreciate you taking the time to look this over. It would be great if you use the handy sharing tools that Indiegogo provides to spread the word about this project and help us reach our goal. You rock and you know it.

story:
With this project, I am seeking to give myself a chance to fulfill my goal or publishing comics. Since there is no comic magazine in my home country, this project has a good chance to grow and succeed.

The project:

The first edition magazine feature five comics stories, a maze game, and text articles.

There will be a print edition, a digital edition for Web, Tablets, and smartphones.

Readers can rate each comic and this can affect the future editions.

The best comic will be adapted as animated comic, a new exciting form of comics !


The Impact of this Magazine

  • The magazine will be the only magazine for Tunisians kids and teenagers. It's a celebration of the new born democracy for the young Tunisians. Young Readers will have their space to express their newly acquired freedom of Speech.
  • This will be the platform for Tunisian Illustrators and artists to publish their comics in a real magazine.
  • Originals stories and characters will live and develop. The readers will be free to give their opinions and significantly influence stories.
  • Already had the full support from the UCDB, Union of Comic Artists and Caricaturists.

Basbous: The blunderer soldier who never gets bored by causing uncanny situations and resolving them.


you can read Basbous Online free : Click Here to read Basbous

Aguyla: In this unnatural world, Evil Djinns hunts humans with their superior powers. One day, when one of them uses his weapons against his fellows hunters, rules are going to change. 



S.U Squad: A highly powered and technological squad are facing dangerous criminals who are equipped with the deadliest weapon of 20th century, the Ak47.


Smells like Revolution: In the colonial Tunisia, Marzouk is a rookie detective making his way through his insignificant life, resolving minor cases and enforcing law. Until one day, all police stations received a defying letter from a group of professional thieves. (This One story is illustrated by my friend and illustrator Moez Tabia, the magazine will welcome more illustrators if everything goes well)


Smarty: Smarty is a scrappy dog who will show you how to get a free meal from local shopkeeper.

Many Other Comics Waiting...

There are many other comics waiting to get published, many ideas  and characters to comes out

(Makiko and Selim, fishing scene - Slice of Life genre story)

What We Need & What You Get

“Printing the first Edition”

This campaign has many goals to achieve depending on funds collected. Here they are by priority Order:

  • 4000 Dollars: Print 2000 Copies + Digital Version for Tablet & Web
  • 5800 Dollars: Print 5000 Copies + Digital Version for Tablet + a Website For the magazine.
  • 7800 Dollars: Print 5000 Copies + Better Digital Version for Tablet + a responsive Website For the magazine.
  • 10000 Dollars :  Print 10000 copies + Better Digital Version for Tablet + a responsive Website For the magazine + Assistant to make the next edition faster
  • 12000 Dollars:  Print 10000 copies + Better Digital Version for Tablet + a responsive Website For the magazine + Assistant + Animation of one of the comics.



    Other Ways You Can Help

    • You can spread the word, publish status, tweet and tell your friends about the project, word to mouth is very effective.
    • You can give your opinion, a piece of advice and any thought you have … it’s very important!

story:
Hi!

My name is Ryan Smith, the cartoonist behind Accursed Dragon. It's a fantasy series that follows an ongoing storyline, but I try to keep it fun and full of adventure! A couple years ago I had Volume 1 printed, which contains the first three stories.  Now it's time to print the second book and hopefully with your help!

The Printing

The plan is to print 1,500 softcover copies of Volume 2.  To help compensate for the cost of printing, our ultimate goal is to reach $5,000.  That is an awful lot and I hope to compensate you for any contributions by giving you a quality book in exchange.

The Incentives

It's very simple! By donating $25, BANG! You get a copy of the freshly printed Accursed Dragon Volume 2 mailed to you (with a thank you and a doodle inside).  I like to provide you with more, however!

  • Donate $35 or more and you get a Volume 1 to accompany your Volume 2.  Already have a copy? Well, think of how much friends and family would like to own it.  :D
  • Cameo opportunities!  A chance to be in the comics and socialize with the characters, depending on the perk you pick.
  • I don't expect people to leap over themselves for a commission from me, but this is your best chance to get one. Anything-ANYTHING-you want and I'll draw it for you.

Just for fun I'll also put some bonus incentives on the website. Considering summer will be upon us in a few months, for every $500 reached I'll draw a character pinup pic.  Humpbrett is first because...well, I can't very well put the most popular characters at the lowest tier now can I?  ;D

The higher we get, the more revealing the pinups!

If we go beyond $5,000 I guess things will get a bit NSFW.  :x

If stretch goals become necessary, I'll come up with more merchandise to include with the books (collectible pins, shirts, etc.).  No sense worry about that until we need to, though.

Thanks for Reading

If you're a reader of Accursed Dragon and stopped by to see what this is all about, thanks.  If you're unable to contribute, don't sweat it. Being a fan is good enough for me. You may help promote the campaign, though.

Did you happen upon here and never heard of the comic?  By all means check it out for free at http://www.accurseddragon.com/. Hopefully you enjoy it enough to come back again!

Hope this goes well!

story:
Résumé

Vous me connaissez pour la plupart, mais je me présente malgré tout. Mon nom est Aline Juhel, étudiante, et j'entame ma première véritable bande dessinée. Je dessine depuis ma petite enfance. Cependant, comme dans beaucoup d'autres projets, la passion ne suffit pas toujours, c'est pour cela que j'ai besoin de votre aide ! Je travaille actuellement sur ma bande dessinée intitulée Maxwell : L'étranger. L'histoire tourne autour d'un jeune plutonien envoyé avec d'autres acolytes sur Terre dans le but de recueillir des informations susceptibles d'enrichir leur planète. Le vaisseau de Maxwell — le jeune plutonien et protagoniste — change de trajectoire et s'écrase dans un champ non loin de Montréal. Cet intrépide explorateur se fait héberger par des humains qui deviennent rapidement ses amis. Ayant peur que ses semblables pensent qu'il a été enlevé, ce dernier est déterminé à ne pas se faire retrouver pour protéger les humains auxquels il tient.

J'ai besoin de dons pour rendre ce rêve réalité.

 Ce dont mon projet a besoin

J'ai besoin d'amasser suffisamment d'argent pour payer le logiciel Illustrator d'Adobe que je paie déjà chaque mois. Ce logiciel me permet de travailler sur chacune de mes planches à dessin, d'y ajouter de la couleur, des textes, etc. Bref, je ne pourrais pas sans. Je souhaite également éditer moi-même ma bande dessinée car, de nos jours, il est souvent plus facile et rentable d'être son propre éditeur... Lorsque tout sera terminé (actuellement, le projet est en bonne marche), la bande dessinée Maxwell : L'étranger sera disponible sur Amazon dans la rubrique Kindle Store.

 L'impact

Vos dons feront la différence car grâce à vous, un projet qui a une importance capitale pour moi deviendra un divertissement pour vous.

 D'autres façons d'aider

Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer en donnant un don, ce n'est pas grave ! Le fait que vous ayez eu un intérêt à lire le résumé de mon projet reflète bien votre générosité. Vous pouvez également m'aider en partageant la page de mon projet à vos proches ou sur les réseaux sociaux. Cette aide sera tout aussi précieuse qu'un don !

story:
Bad Girls is a book about my beautiful, crazy women: aggressive, hypnotic, sensual, ironic.

Their common trait is that they're all creature out of any standard, like their sex appeal is.

Bad Girls è il libro delle mie donne bellissime e folli: aggressive, ipnotiche, sensuali, ironiche.
La loro caratteristica comune è che sono creature assolutamente fuori dai canoni della normalità, come fuori dal comune è la loro carica erotica.



My wishes

During my 30-years-long career,  I've worked with the major Italian, European  and American publisher: S.Bonelli, Mondadori, Delcourt, Dupuis, Marvel, DC Comics, IDW Publishing, Darby Pop, etc. and I decided to start making plans I have in mind from a long time, illustrated books and comics. For this I need your support, because I have many things to tell and illustrate


In circa 30 anni di carriera,  ho collaborato con i maggiori editori Italiani,
Europei ed Americani :  S.Bonelli, Mondadori, Delcourt, Dupuis, Marvel, DC
Comics, IDW Poblishing, Darby Pop, solo per citarne alcuni, ed  ho deciso di iniziare a fare progetti che ho in mente da tempo, libri e fumetti illustrati. Per questo ho bisogno del vostro sostegno, perché ho molte cose da raccontare ed illustrare


The Book

*This book will sport 30 illustrations, collected over the last 10 years. 30  fantastic female heroes that will be ready for the last months of 2015, so to be ready for the set release date, which is February 2016. Different techniques are used across the book: water paint, acrylic, fresco-secco, coloured pencils and digital colouring. In this book you'll wind the Female Warrior, the Dark Lady, the Queen, the Vampire: tough and sexy women, sometimes mean, but always ironic.

Questo Volume conterrà 30 illustrazioni, una raccolta degli Ultimi 10 annidi lavoro e non solo.  30  eroine fantastiche  che saranno pronteper la fine del 2015, in modo da rispettare i tempi di consegna previsti ,Febbraio 2016. Le tecniche artistiche per realizzare sono molteplici, acquerello, acrilico, tempera, matite colorate e colori digitali. In questo libro troverai la Guerriera, la Dark Lady, la Regina, la Vampira:  donne dure e sensuali, a volte malvagie, ma sempre con un tocco di ironia.


Risks & Challenges

If the campaign will be a success, the release date will be February 2016. I'm sure many of you will want help me realise this book – I'm positive that you will also share this project with your friends. You can obviously contact me if you have any questions or doubts.

Garantisco  la consegna prevista per il mese di Febbraio 2016, qualora la
campagna fondi andasse a buon fine, Tutti gli impegni verso coloro che
contribuiranno alla sua realizzazione saranno rispettati. Sono certo che
sarete in molti ad aiutarmi a realizzare questo volume, ce confido nel
vostro desiderio di condividere anche con i vostri amici questo mio
progetto.
Chiunque di voi avra’ curiosità e domande , puoi contattarmi senza alcun
problema

Help me to share

Help me to share this project with your friends, it will be very important to me. this is my first project crowdfounding, the first of other even more 'ambitious that I will launch in the coming months, I hope you will trust me.

Aiutami a condividere questo progetto con i tuoi amici, sarà molto importante per me. questo è il mio primo progetto di crowdfounding, il primo di altri ancora piu' ambiziosi che io lancero' nei prossimi mesi, io spero che tu avrai   fiducia in me. 

Giancarlo Caracuzzo: illustrator and comics artist

Italian artist Giancarlo Caracuzzo has been an illustrator, comics artist and story board artist since 1982, working for a huge range of European and American companies, including Marvel Comics, DC Comics, IDW, Darby Pop, Image, S.Bonelli Editore, editions Delcourt and Dupuis. His recent comic credits include Spider-Man, Iron Man, Cable, Orson Scott's Formic Wars and Gorilla Man for Marvel Entertainment; Batman 66 & J.Hex for DC ComicsThe last Resort and the series "Indestructible" for IDW

story:
Summary

It has been rich pickings for a cartoonist in Scotland over the last few years and I've helped myself liberally. The weekly cartoon for Wings Over Scotland has charted an exhilarating period in our history. Now, and by popular demand (no, really) I've compiled the choicest of the choice from Wings and other publications for a book no evil separatist should be without.

The Offer

Welcome to Cairnstoon features cartoons from the beginning of the Indyref campaign all the way through to the summer of 2015 and the tumultuous aftermath of arguably the most important General Election in post-war history. Over 160 pages of cartoons and caustic comment, it recalls the highs and lows of Scotland's odyssey in search of independence.

Remember all our pals from Project Fear? There's Dr Doom Darling, Car Crash Interview Lamont, Pants on Fire McDougall and many more. Also featuring are the Eton Old Boys Club now running the country, feckless Lib Dems and a supine Labour Party behaving like Indecisive Dave from The Fast Show – agreeing with whatever the last person said to them down the pub. And, throughout, we have the enduring double act illustrating the shifting tides of relations between a Westminster-dominated UK and Scotland – John Bull and our very own Scottish lion, Hamish.

Printed in full colour throughout on matt coated art paper with a gloss laminated cover, Welcome to Cairnstoon is 24cm x 24cm (9.5" x 9.5") and comes in soft and hard back versions.

There is a foreword by leading commentator and Observer columnist Kevin McKenna and an introduction by Rev Stuart Campbell, editor of Wings Over Scotland. I've cut out the bits that weren't about me.

I'm offering five levels of perks for contributors eager to get their hands on a signed and numbered first edition copy in either hard or soft cover with lots of goodies – prints and badges – many featuring Hamish.

What is Needed

The book – soft and hard cover – is being published by Greg Moodie and will be printed in Scotland by Bell & Bain Ltd (producers of such modern classics as Greg Moodie Versus The Union and Reeds Nautical Almanac). We are looking for £7,500 to cover the cost of this plus postage and packaging.

Interesting Times

We are in the midst of a political revolution in Scotland and the old certainties are still crumbling before our eyes. Historians will look back on this era and have not just the old print and broadcast sources to trawl for evidence of what these times were like to live through, but also an explosion of online and social media. I and a hardy but shrinking band of cartoonists are determined that our artform continues to be a part of that archive. Your support for this book and any newspaper, magazine, blog or online journal that employs cartoonists will go a long way to helping us do that. Thank you.

Also featuring are the Eton Old Boys Club now running the country, feckless Lib Dems and a supine Labour Party behaving like Indecisive Dave from The Fast Show – agreeing with whatever the last person said to them down the pub. And, throughout, we have the enduring double act illustrating the shifting tides of relations between a Westminster-dominated UK and Scotland – John Bull and our very own Scottish lion, Hamish.Printed in full colour throughout on matt coated art paper with a gloss laminated cover, Welcome to Cairnstoon is 24cm x 24cm (9.5" x 9.5") and comes in soft and hard back versions.There is a foreword by leading commentator and Observer columnist Kevin McKenna and an introduction by Rev Stuart Campbell, editor of Wings Over Scotland. I've cut out the bits that weren't about me.I'm offering five levels of perks for contributors eager to get their hands on a signed and numbered first edition copy in either hard or soft cover with lots of goodies – prints and badges – many featuring Hamish.
  What is Needed  The book – soft and hard cover – is being published by Greg Moodie and will be printed in Scotland by Bell & Bain Ltd (producers of such modern classics as Greg Moodie Versus The Union and Reeds Nautical Almanac). We are looking for £7,500 to cover the cost of this plus postage and packaging.Interesting Times
We are in the midst of a political revolution in Scotland and the old certainties are still crumbling before our eyes. Historians will look back on this era and have not just the old print and broadcast sources to trawl for evidence of what these times were like to live through, but also an explosion of online and social media. I and a hardy but shrinking band of cartoonists are determined that our artform continues to be a part of that archive. Your support for this book and any newspaper, magazine, blog or online journal that employs cartoonists will go a long way to helping us do that. Thank you.

story:
COLLECTED AS A GRAPHIC NOVEL
FOR THE FIRST TIME!

Before the Black Lightning TV show and before thousands of Hollywood storyboards, writer Charles Holland and artist Dwayne Turner teamed up to create: Butcher Knight!

This Clover Exclusive Edition
available on Indiegogo is signed by both creators,
Charles Holland and Dwayne Turner! 

A terrifying tale of Sir Lancelot and Merlin in modern day California. The millennia spanning battle between these two members of King Arthur’s court attracts the attention of a young witch and a paranormal fighting team known as Section X in a story that brings Hell to Earth.

"In the Multiverse, Merlin has been depicted as a wizard of good in various stories, but in this story, he is a man of evil and his father is Satan! I didn't see this one coming and here I found another intriguing surprise... bam! I said to myself, what could possibly happen next?"
–Paul Dale Roberts, Silver Bullet Comics review of issue #1

Hand-Signed Graphic Novel

Each of the books sold on this campaign is hand-signed by the creators Charles Holland and Dwayne Turner. They are numbered, limited to 100 copies.

 

 

Bookmark

Don't lose your page in Butcher Knight with this 2" x  6" bookmark. Printed full color on both sides and includes a silk tassel. 

 

Letter-it-Yourself Greeting Cards

Send a card to friends and family, hand-writing your own personal MESSAGE on the FRONT of the card and the INSIDE of the card. Featuring art by Dwayne Turner and ripped from the pages of Butcher Knight. These Greeting Cards are 5" x 7" and includes envelopes. Two different designs will come with your order. 

*Art may change on final product

 

Dwayne Turner Original Art

Turner is an acclaimed comic book artist, concept artist, and Hollywood storyboard artist. And now you can own a piece of Dwayne Turner original art. Limited to FIVE, 5" x 7" sketch. 

*Art may change on final product. Art subject decided by artist.

 

Charles Holland

Television writer and producer Charles D. Holland has worked on numerous shows, including Black Lightning, JAG, Profiler, Millennium, Murder One, and New York Undercover. A member of the California Bar, Holland has a law degree from Harvard Law School, and is a former vice president of business affairs at 20th Century Fox.

 

Dwayne Turner

Acclaimed comic book artist, concept artist, and Hollywood storyboard artist, with thirty years experience, Dwayne has worked along Hollywood’s A-list directors and producers including Will Smith, David Fincher, and Jon Favreau.  Dwayne’s credits span across multiple entertainment genres. His feature film credits include: James Cameron and Robert Rodriguez's Alita: Battle Angel, Disney's Tron: Legacy, Universal’s Oblivion, and Disney’s Jungle Book. His comic book work includes: Marvel Comics’ Wolverine, DC Comics Batman and Superman, and Todd McFarlane’s Spawn. His video game work includes: Triple A titles, Halo, God of War 1 and 2, and Gears of War.

story:
BP3: Cypress the First Bubba

This is the third issue of the Bubba Patrol series. The comic book is about my dogs as super heroes and is the legacy to show the world how I see them everyday. BP3 tells the origin story of the very first Bubba, Cypress and tells the story of how she went from unwanted runt of the litter to full fledged legendary super hero. There shall come a Bubba. Her name is Cypress, and the Antiheroverse will never be the same.

 

Campaign Goals and What Backers Get

  • The initial goal of this project is $700. This will allow me to print 700 copies of the Bubba Patrol issue 3 and pay my editor and guest pinup artists.
  • You're going to get the full color issue on newsprint just like comics were when I began collecting. There are perks that will get you "reBARKED" and signed covers where I will sketch a remark on the cover, a limited sketch cover option to have a special edition of the book with a full color sketch from me. If you missed the first two issues have no fear the Bubbas are also here to give you the whole story so far. There will also be options for retailers. There will be several stretch goals including a variant cover painted by the amazing Vic Hollins, a trading card set and more.
  • This is a flexible funded campaign. If we don't reach the first goal, the money raised will go towards the printing of the book and some extra, out of the box, funding options will begin to take place.

 

Why should you back this project?

  • The Bubba Patrol is the most important series I have ever worked on. It is both the most personal and best project I could ever hope to work on. These dogs aren't just characters, they are my dogs and my family. This issue gives Cypress her legacy and shows the world why she and the rest of the Bubbas are so very important to me.
  • Comic books should be fun. And The Bubba Patrol makes people smile, laugh and it has captured fans both young and old. The Bubba Patrol is quick and fun read but always has tons of Easter eggs included. At age 4, my nephew looked through the pictures with me and was cracking up as he followed the story.
  • I have run 3 crowd funding campaigns for the Bubba Patrol issues 1 and 2 and for the Bubba Files last year (my first campaign on Indiegogo). Each project has been funded, although the Bubba Files took a bit of those outside of the box funding ideas.
  • This project, like so many others, doesn't happen without crowd and fan support. For years I have produced comics while going into debt when printing them. The Bubba Patrol project has resonated best with my readers and fans and through some unique practices fans get to be able to say, "I helped make this creator's vision and dream become reality."

 

Risks & Challenges

All projects have risks and challenges. All the major challenges with this project have already occurred. In January I lost all of the files when I was just two pages away from completing the line art when my portable hard drive fell and broke. One page was still open when those files were lost and I slowly began to recreate and improve upon the original 32 page script. In February, Foley was diagnosed with cancer. This made working on the book even harder, but made the final product even more important. The task of having to redo the whole book challenged me to make the book even better, adding some fun scenes with the appearance of several friends and give Foley his special moment. The challenge also has to do with making sure this book is completed and in had before I have to say goodbye to Foley.

  • As of the start of this campaign I have very little to do to finish. There are less than 3 pages to color and the cover, which I already have the concept for.
  • Time management is key, but there is not much left to do. In order to make this book the absolute best it can be I am going to be steady but deliberate in these last few parts.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everyone (especially right now) has the funds to support this campaign. And if you can't, I ask that you share the story, tweet it, post it on Facebook, or tell your comic book loving, fur family friends about it.

  • Every dollar counts towards the end goal of printing this comic book. If you can contribute, please do.
  • Once you've backed the campaign, please remember to tell others why you backed the Bubba Patrol issue 3. Using the Indiegogo share tools is very quick and easy.
